analyzed: de bas na shing gi don las gzhan pa shing ma yin pa bzlog pa gang yin pa de med pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, the absence of the other, the non-tree, which is different from the referent of the word ‚Äútree,‚Äù is the exclusion of the other.

original: gal te de las shing ma yin pa'i don bzlog pa rtogs par gyur na de lta na shing ma yin pa las zlog pa'i ngo bo shing gi don brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de las shing ma yin pa'i don bzlog pa rtogs par gyur na de lta na shing ma yin pa las zlog pa'i ngo bo shing gi don brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the meaning of the opposite of that were understood, then the meaning of the tree, the opposite of the non-tree, would be expressed.

original: gzhan las tha dad pa ni bya ba'i tha dad pa rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo la snang ba de nyid ni de las ldog pa las don gzhan las ldog pas ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis shugs kyis go bas cha rtogs shing khong du chud paüîΩyin te / dngos po zhes bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
analyzed: gzhan las tha dad pa ni bya ba'i tha dad pa rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo la snang ba de nyid ni de las ldog pa las don gzhan las ldog pas ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis shugs kyis go bas cha rtogs shing khong du chud pa yin te / dngos po zhes bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
translated: The difference from another is the difference in action, which appears to the conceptual mind. That very [difference] is understood and comprehended by implication through the opposite of that, the opposite of another object, in the manner explained.üîΩThe term aspect of the thing is used because it comes from seeing the opposite of the thing.

original: log pa'i dngos po mthong ba'i sgo nas 'ongs pa'i phyir dngos po'i cha zhes brjod do snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: log pa'i dngos po mthong ba'i sgo nas 'ongs pa'i phyir dngos po'i cha zhes brjod do snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: This is what is thought.

original: 'di skad du bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is what is explained:üîΩFrom among those that produce conceit towards that, it produces conceit towards the opposite nature.üîΩOne should understand that the word thing is used for the opposite of that.üîΩThis is what is said:

original: sgras ni der snyems pa skyed par byed pa yin pa dag las log pa'i ngo bor snyems pa skyed par byed pa la gcig @142a * //
analyzed: sgras ni der snyems pa skyed par byed pa yin pa dag las log pa'i ngo bor snyems pa skyed par byed pa la gcig @142a * //
translated: The word produces conceit towards that. From among those that produce conceit towards the opposite nature, it produces conceit towards the opposite.

original: pa nyid du sgro btags pa rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo la snang ba'i rnam pa gcig kho na ston par byed de /
analyzed: pa nyid du sgro btags pa rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo la snang ba'i rnam pa gcig kho na ston par byed de /
translated: It is only the aspect that appears to the conceptual consciousness that superimposes the intrinsic reality.

original: sgra'i shes pa la de kho na snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra'i shes pa la de kho na snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that alone appears to the cognition of the word.

original: de ston pa na gzhan ldog pa ni shugs kyis 'phen par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ston pa na gzhan ldog pa ni shugs kyis 'phen par 'gyur te /
translated: When it is taught, the exclusion of other is implicitly projected.

original: de bas na slob dpon gyis bsams pa 'dis /
analyzed: de bas na slob dpon gyis bsams pa 'dis /
translated: Therefore, the master‚Äôs thought is as follows.

original: de nyid gzhan las ldog pa yis //
analyzed: de nyid gzhan las ldog pa yis //
translated: Through the exclusion of that reality from other things,üîΩa portion of that thing is understood.

original: dngos po de yi cha 'ga' zhig / rtogs 'gyur zhes rab tu bshad kyi /
analyzed: dngos po de yi cha 'ga' zhig / rtogs 'gyur zhes rab tu bshad kyi /
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: gzhan ldog pa sgra'i don du gyur pas phyi rol gyi dngos po'i cha 'ga' rtogs pa ni med do //
analyzed: gzhan ldog pa sgra'i don du gyur pas phyi rol gyi dngos po'i cha 'ga' rtogs pa ni med do //
translated: Since the exclusion of other is not the meaning of the word, a portion of an external thing is not understood.

original: de ltar na re zhig /
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig /
translated: Thus, first,

original: de nyid gzhan las ldog pa yis //
analyzed: de nyid gzhan las ldog pa yis //
translated: Through the exclusion of that reality from other things,

original: dngos po de yi cha 'ga' zhig //
analyzed: dngos po de yi cha 'ga' zhig //
translated: a portion of that thing

original: rtogs 'gyur zhes pas rab tu bshad //
analyzed: rtogs 'gyur zhes pas rab tu bshad //
translated: is understood. Thus it is explained.

original: ces bya ba de gzhung 'dzugs pa yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba de gzhung 'dzugs pa yin no //
translated: This is the establishment of the text.

original: da ni sgra'i don gzhan las ldog pas khyad par du byas pa'i dngos po dag kho na brjod do zhes bya ba de gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni sgra'i don gzhan las ldog pas khyad par du byas pa'i dngos po dag kho na brjod do zhes bya ba de gzhung gzugs pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to set forth the treatise, he says, I will speak only of things that are qualified by being the reverse of other sounds.üîΩ

original: de rtogs pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de rtogs pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Now, in order to set forth the treatise, he says, ‚ÄúThe cognition of that is the exclusion of other,‚Äù and so on.

original: tha dad pa ji skad bshad pa de rtogs shing khong du chud pa ni de'i khyad par can yin pa'i phyir de rtogs pa gang la khyad par de yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa ji skad bshad pa de rtogs shing khong du chud pa ni de'i khyad par can yin pa'i phyir de rtogs pa gang la khyad par de yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The cognition of that which is different as explained is the exclusion of other because it has that as its qualifier. That which has that is called that.

original: de las gzhan pa bzlog pa 'dzin pa med pa nyid de'i khyad par can yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa bzlog pa 'dzin pa med pa nyid de'i khyad par can yin no //
translated: The absence of the apprehension of that which is different from that is the exclusion of other.

original: 'di skad du sgras blo la snang ba'i tha dad pa de kho na rtogs par byed pa na don gzhan ldog pa shugs kyis 'phen pa gang yin pa de med na med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di skad du sgras blo la snang ba'i tha dad pa de kho na rtogs par byed pa na don gzhan ldog pa shugs kyis 'phen pa gang yin pa de med na med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is what is said: When the cognition of that which is different as it appears to the mind is produced, the exclusion of other is implicitly projected, because it is invariably concomitant with it.

original: slob dpon gyis don gzhan zlog pas khyad par du byas pa rtogs par byed do zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis don gzhan zlog pas khyad par du byas pa rtogs par byed do zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: The master says that the cognition of that which is qualified by the exclusion of other is produced.

original: 'khar ba thogs pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa'i dpe ste /
analyzed: 'khar ba thogs pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa'i dpe ste /
translated: ‚ÄúLike a stick-holder‚Äù is an example of a dissimilar case.

original: ji ltar 'khar ba thogs pa'i sgo nas 'khar ba thogs pa'i sgo zhes brjod pa ltar zlog pa'i sgo nas bzlog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'khar ba thogs pa'i sgo nas 'khar ba thogs pa'i sgo zhes brjod pa ltar zlog pa'i sgo nas bzlog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Just as one does not say ‚Äústick-holder‚Äù on the basis of holding a stick, but rather ‚Äústick-holder‚Äù on the basis of holding a stick, so too one does not say ‚Äúpossessor of reversal‚Äù on the basis of reversal.

original: gang zhig gang gis khyad par du byas pa'i phyi rol gyi don rnams sgra dag gis brjod par 'gyur ba don gzhan ldog pa sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gis khyad par du byas pa'i phyi rol gyi don rnams sgra dag gis brjod par 'gyur ba don gzhan ldog pa sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du gyur pa yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: There is no external object that is qualified by something else, which is expressed by words, and the exclusion of other objects is the reason for the application of the word.

original: gang gi phyir ji ltar rnam par phye ba'i tshul gyis na sgra gzhan gyis don gzhan ldog pas khyad par du byas pa'i dngos po rnams mi brjod pa de'i phyir gsal byed la sogs pas @142b gal te sgras don gzhan bzlog pas khyad par du byas pa'i dngos
analyzed: gang gi phyir ji ltar rnam par phye ba'i tshul gyis na sgra gzhan gyis don gzhan ldog pas khyad par du byas pa'i dngos po rnams mi brjod pa de'i phyir gsal byed la sogs pas @142b gal te sgras don gzhan bzlog pas khyad par du byas pa'i dngos
translated: Because, as explained, the other words do not express the things that are qualified by the exclusion of other objects by the other words, therefore, the grammarians say that the words such as ‚Äúmanifest‚Äù qualify the things by excluding other objects by the words.

original: po dag brjod na de dang ldan pa tsam gyi phyogs la nyes par bshad pa gang yin pa de gzhan sel ba yang yod do zhes smras pa de gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: po dag brjod na de dang ldan pa tsam gyi phyogs la nyes par bshad pa gang yin pa de gzhan sel ba yang yod do zhes smras pa de gsal ba yin no //
translated: If one says that it is a mere possession of those, then the fault explained in the case of the mere possession of those applies also to the existence of the exclusion of other.üîΩSome say: Since difference is a particular, this is a particular of that which is differentiated.

original: kha cig khyad par ni bye brag yin pas de la rnam 'grel byed pa 'di'i khyad par can yin pa'i phyir zhes smras par bzlog pa bye brag nyid du 'dod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: kha cig khyad par ni bye brag yin pas de la rnam 'grel byed pa 'di'i khyad par can yin pa'i phyir zhes smras par bzlog pa bye brag nyid du 'dod pa ma yin nam /
translated: Since it is said that it is a particular, is it not asserted that the reversal is a particular?

original: de ji ste don gzhan bzlog pa bye brag tu gyur pa yod pa ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa snyam du dogs par 'gyur bas de'i phyir dbye bar bya ba gnyis kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ji ste don gzhan bzlog pa bye brag tu gyur pa yod pa ni ma yin no zhes bshad pa snyam du dogs par 'gyur bas de'i phyir dbye bar bya ba gnyis kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Since it might be thought that it is explained that the reversal of another object does not exist, in order to clarify that, he says, ‚Äúbecause of the difference of the two things that are differentiated.‚Äù

original: dbye bar bya ba shing dang shing ma yin pa gnyis ka tha dad pa gang yin pa de ni shing dang shing ma yin pa gnyis ka la yod pa'i phyir yod pa'i tha dad pa brjod na yang shing ma yin pa la ltos nas shing la yod pa'i
analyzed: dbye bar bya ba shing dang shing ma yin pa gnyis ka tha dad pa gang yin pa de ni shing dang shing ma yin pa gnyis ka la yod pa'i phyir yod pa'i tha dad pa brjod na yang shing ma yin pa la ltos nas shing la yod pa'i
translated: Since the difference of the two things that are differentiated, tree and non-tree, is the existence of both a tree and a non-tree, when the difference of existence is stated, it is said that the tree exists in dependence on the non-tree.

original: tha dad pa gang yin pa de sgras brjod na yang de las gzhan pa 'phen pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa gang yin pa de sgras brjod na yang de las gzhan pa 'phen pa med pa yin te /
translated: If that which is different is expressed by the word, then that which is different from that is not implied.

original: shing ma yin pa la ltos nas shing las yod pa'i tha dad pa de las gzhan pa shing la ltos nas shing ma yin pa'i tha dad pa yang 'phen pa yin no //
analyzed: shing ma yin pa la ltos nas shing las yod pa'i tha dad pa de las gzhan pa shing la ltos nas shing ma yin pa'i tha dad pa yang 'phen pa yin no //
translated: The difference of the tree from the non-tree, in dependence on the non-tree, implies the difference of the non-tree from the tree, in dependence on the tree.

original: gal te shing las kyang shing ma yin pa tha dad par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te shing las kyang shing ma yin pa tha dad par gyur na /
translated: If the non-tree were different from the tree,

original: de lta na shing ma yin pa las shing tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na shing ma yin pa las shing tha dad pa yin no //
translated: then the tree would be different from the non-tree.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs te /
translated: Therefore is the reason.

original: de'i phyir khyad par can yin pa'i phyir bshad do zhes bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par can yin pa'i phyir bshad do zhes bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
translated: Therefore, because it is a qualifier, it is explained, this is the implication.

original: de dag la zhes byang ni gcig la yod pa'i tha dad pa dang de las gzhan pa bzlog pa la ste /
analyzed: de dag la zhes byang ni gcig la yod pa'i tha dad pa dang de las gzhan pa bzlog pa la ste /
translated: In regard to those, the difference that exists in one thing and is the opposite of that which is different from that,

original: khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po ni med do //
analyzed: khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po ni med do //
translated: the entity of the substratum of the qualifier does not exist.

original: yang gal te gang gis na sgra las gcig pa yod pa'i tha dad pa gzhan bzlog pa med na med pa rtogs par 'gyur ba gcig la yod pa'i tha dad pa 'di ni gang zhig yin /
analyzed: yang gal te gang gis na sgra las gcig pa yod pa'i tha dad pa gzhan bzlog pa med na med pa rtogs par 'gyur ba gcig la yod pa'i tha dad pa 'di ni gang zhig yin /
translated: Moreover, if the difference that exists in one thing were not refuted, then nondifference would be understood. What is this difference that exists in one thing?

original: de las gzhan pa bzlog pa yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa bzlog pa yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: And what is the difference that is the opposite of that?

original: bshad pa re zhig shing gi skras brjod par bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo la snang ba yal ga la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni rnam pa shing thams cad la ngo bo tha mi dad pa lta bu dang / de'i ngo bo ma yin pa dag las tha dad pa lta bur snang ste /
analyzed: bshad pa re zhig shing gi skras brjod par bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo la snang ba yal ga la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni rnam pa shing thams cad la ngo bo tha mi dad pa lta bu dang / de'i ngo bo ma yin pa dag las tha dad pa lta bur snang ste /
translated: The answer is: First, the expression ‚Äútree‚Äù appears to a conceptual consciousness. It appears as if it were not a different entity from all trees, such as having branches and so on, and it appears as if it were different from those that are not trees.

original: ma yin pa'i tshul gyis gcig la yod pa'i tha dad pa yin no //üîΩde bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa'i @143a * //
analyzed: ma yin pa'i tshul gyis gcig la yod pa'i tha dad pa yin no // de bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa'i @143a * //
translated: It is the difference that exists in one thing in the manner of not being that.

original: sgras brjod par bya ba gcig la yod pa'i tha dad pa yang khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: sgras brjod par bya ba gcig la yod pa'i tha dad pa yang khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, understand that the difference that exists in one thing is the expression ‚Äúpot‚Äù and so on.

original: de nyid sgras ston pa na rigs mi mthun pa bzlog pa med par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid shugs kyis go bar byed de /
analyzed: de nyid sgras ston pa na rigs mi mthun pa bzlog pa med par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid shugs kyis go bar byed de /
translated: When that is taught by the word, the characteristic of a non-implicative negation that does not exclude dissimilar instances is understood by implication.

original: de ni de las gzhan bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni de las gzhan bzlog pa yin no //
translated: That is the exclusion of what is other than that.

original: sgras ni ji ltar rnam par dbye ba'i tha dad pa gang yin pa de gcig kho na brjod de /
analyzed: sgras ni ji ltar rnam par dbye ba'i tha dad pa gang yin pa de gcig kho na brjod de /
translated: The word expresses just one of the divisions that are different from each other.

original: de rtogs pa nyid rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de rtogs pa nyid rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The understanding of that is the understanding of the positive concomitance.

original: gzhan ldog pa shugs kyis grub pa gang yin pa de ni ldog pa rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan ldog pa shugs kyis grub pa gang yin pa de ni ldog pa rtogs pa yin te /
translated: That which is established by implication through the exclusion of other is the understanding of the exclusion.

original: de ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa rtogs pas sgra don dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa rtogs pas sgra don dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: In that way, by understanding the positive concomitance and the exclusion, the word has a meaning.

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tha dad pa gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tha dad pa gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to clarify that, it is said that the different is one, etc.

original: rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo la snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tha dad pa rtogs pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du sgras rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa brjod pas byas pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo la snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi tha dad pa rtogs pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du sgras rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa brjod pas byas pa yin te /
translated: Because the different that appears to the conceptual mind is understood through the characteristics, the word expresses the positive concomitance and the exclusion in that order.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni dngos su brjod la ldog pa ni shugs kyis brjod par blta bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni dngos su brjod la ldog pa ni shugs kyis brjod par blta bar bya ba'o //
translated: The forward mode is to be seen as the explicit expression, and the reverse mode as the implicit expression.

original: brjod pa des slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos sgra rnams tha snyad kyi yan lag nyid du ston pa na de las bzlog pas dngos po'i cha rtogs par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: brjod pa des slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos sgra rnams tha snyad kyi yan lag nyid du ston pa na de las bzlog pas dngos po'i cha rtogs par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: When the master Dignaga teaches that words are the limbs of convention, he explains that the understanding of the aspect of the entity is by way of the reverse mode,

original: de bzhin du des khyad par du byas pa rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bshad de /
analyzed: de bzhin du des khyad par du byas pa rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bshad de /
translated: or that the understanding is qualified by that.

original: bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ldog pa bshad la /
analyzed: bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ldog pa bshad la /
translated: The word ‚Äúreverse‚Äù explains the reverse mode,

original: dngos po'i cha zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rjes su 'gro ba bshad do //
analyzed: dngos po'i cha zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rjes su 'gro ba bshad do //
translated: and the word ‚Äúaspect of the entity‚Äù explains the forward mode.

original: 'dis ni sgras ni sgra dang don gzhan sel bar byed cing rang gi don byed par brjod do zhes bya ba 'di yang rnam par bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni sgras ni sgra dang don gzhan sel bar byed cing rang gi don byed par brjod do zhes bya ba 'di yang rnam par bshad pa yin te /
translated: This also explains the statement that words eliminate other objects and express their own object.

original: de la rang gi don ni gcig la yod pa'i tha dad pa rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo la snang bar bshad pa gang yin pa de kho na yin no //
analyzed: de la rang gi don ni gcig la yod pa'i tha dad pa rnam par rtog pa can gyi blo la snang bar bshad pa gang yin pa de kho na yin no //
translated: There, the own object is just that which is explained as the appearance in the conceptual mind of the difference that exists in one thing.

original: de la don gzhan bzlog pa ni don gzhan sel ba ste /
analyzed: de la don gzhan bzlog pa ni don gzhan sel ba ste /
translated: The exclusion of other objects is the exclusion of other objects.

original: med pa dgag pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: med pa dgag pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: It is the characteristic of a nonimplicative negation.

original: de med cing zhes bya ba ni shugs kyis go bar byed cing zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de med cing zhes bya ba ni shugs kyis go bar byed cing zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat is understood through implication‚Äù means that it is understood through implication.

original: gang gi phyir tha dad pa gcig brjod na yang gzhan bzlog pa shugs kyis rtogs pas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha dad pa gcig brjod na yang gzhan bzlog pa shugs kyis rtogs pas /
translated: Because when one thing is stated, the exclusion of other things is understood through implication.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: rang gi @143b don ni tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni shing gi sgra'i don yang yal ga la sogs pa dang ldan pa rnam par rtog pa la snang ba gang yin pa de ni tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: rang gi @143b don ni tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni shing gi sgra'i don yang yal ga la sogs pa dang ldan pa rnam par rtog pa la snang ba gang yin pa de ni tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin te /
translated: The meaning of the word tree is the form of a tree that is imagined to possess branches, etc. It is a form that is different from other things,

original: bdag nyid kyis de ma yin pa'i rnam pa dag las log pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis de ma yin pa'i rnam pa dag las log pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the opposite of things that are not itself.

original: de'i phyir rang gi don tha dad pa'i ngo bo brjod pa kho nas shugs kyis gzhan bzlog pa rtogs te gal te shugs kyis de la shing ma yin pa'i don bzlog par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi don tha dad pa'i ngo bo brjod pa kho nas shugs kyis gzhan bzlog pa rtogs te gal te shugs kyis de la shing ma yin pa'i don bzlog par 'gyur na /
translated: If the meaning of the word were to exclude the non-tree implicitly,

original: de lta na shing ma yin pa las tha dad pa'i ngo bo shing gi don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na shing ma yin pa las tha dad pa'i ngo bo shing gi don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the meaning of the word tree would be understood as having a nature that is different from the non-tree.

original: de lta bas na sgra'i byed pa ni rang gi don brjod pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: de lta bas na sgra'i byed pa ni rang gi don brjod pa kho na yin la /
translated: Therefore, the function of the word is the expression of its own meaning,

original: gzhan bzlog pa ni shugs kyis yin pas sgra la bya ba gnyis ni med do //
analyzed: gzhan bzlog pa ni shugs kyis yin pas sgra la bya ba gnyis ni med do //
translated: and the exclusion of the other is implicit. Thus, the word has no more than one function.

original: de bas na gzhon nu ma len pa la sogs pas sgra gcig gis bya ba gnyis mi nus pa'i phyir thams cad du sgra gnyis brjod par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa gang yin pa de spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gzhon nu ma len pa la sogs pas sgra gcig gis bya ba gnyis mi nus pa'i phyir thams cad du sgra gnyis brjod par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa gang yin pa de spangs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the objection raised by Kumarila and others, namely, that because one word cannot have two functions, it follows that two words must be uttered in every case, is refuted.

original: gal te rang gi don tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin la ni rag na 'on kyang gang gi tshe rang gi don khyad par can 'di bsgrub pa gtso bor brjod pa de'i tshe sgra las rjes su 'gro ba kho na rtogs par zad kyi ldog pa ni ma
analyzed: gal te rang gi don tha dad pa'i ngo bo yin la ni rag na 'on kyang gang gi tshe rang gi don khyad par can 'di bsgrub pa gtso bor brjod pa de'i tshe sgra las rjes su 'gro ba kho na rtogs par zad kyi ldog pa ni ma
translated: If the meaning of the word were a different entity, then when the specific meaning is stated as the principal thing to be established, at that time only the forward pervasion would be understood, not the counter pervasion.

original: yin no // gang gi tshe dag dgag pa gtso cher byed pa dper na chang btung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba lta bu 'di la yang bzlog pa btung bar sgrub pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang chang 'thung bar thal ba dgag pa tsam byed par zad do //
analyzed: yin no // gang gi tshe dag dgag pa gtso cher byed pa dper na chang btung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba lta bu 'di la yang bzlog pa btung bar sgrub pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang chang 'thung bar thal ba dgag pa tsam byed par zad do //
translated: When negation is the principal thing to be expressed, as in ‚ÄúOne should not drink alcohol,‚Äù the reverse pervasion is not established as ‚ÄúOne should drink,‚Äù but rather the mere negation of the consequence of drinking alcohol.

original: de bas na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa brjod pas sgra rnams tha snyad kyi yan lag nyid du ston pa na zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa brjod pas sgra rnams tha snyad kyi yan lag nyid du ston pa na zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is illogical to say that when words are shown to be parts of a convention by stating the forward and counter pervasions.

original: ldog pa med pa tsam gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ldog pa med pa tsam gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To respond: ‚ÄúIt is not just the absence of the counter pervasion‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: so sor nges pa'i don bsgrub pa ni rjes su 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i don bsgrub pa ni rjes su 'gro ba ste /
translated: The establishment of the individual meaning is the forward pervasion.

original: dper na shing chod cig ces bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na shing chod cig ces bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like saying ‚Äúcut the tree.‚Äù

original: de la shing ma yin pa shugs kyis bzlog pa ni ldog pa'o //
analyzed: de la shing ma yin pa shugs kyis bzlog pa ni ldog pa'o //
translated: There, the exclusion of what is not a tree is the counter pervasion.

original: gang la de med pa de ni ldog pa med pa can te /
analyzed: gang la de med pa de ni ldog pa med pa can te /
translated: That which does not have that is without the counter pervasion.

original: de lta bu'i rjes su 'gro ba yang med kyi //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rjes su 'gro ba yang med kyi //
translated: There is no such forward pervasion,

original: 'on kyang thams cad ldog pa dang bcas pa kho na yin no //üîΩrjes su 'gro ba med pa can gyi ldog pa med na yang de'i dngos po'i so na 'dug pa la cung zad kyang mi byed pas de bzhin du dmigs pa la sogs @144a * //
analyzed: 'on kyang thams cad ldog pa dang bcas pa kho na yin no // rjes su 'gro ba med pa can gyi ldog pa med na yang de'i dngos po'i so na 'dug pa la cung zad kyang mi byed pas de bzhin du dmigs pa la sogs @144a * //
translated: but rather, all have the counter pervasion.

original: pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If there is no counter pervasion without the forward pervasion, then it does not do anything to the thing that is in its own place. Therefore, it would follow that the same is true of observation, etc.

original: ngo bo nyid gzhan ni 'di'i sgrib pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid gzhan ni 'di'i sgrib pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Another nature is not its obscuration,

original: de'i so na 'dug pa de la sgrib par yang mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i so na 'dug pa de la sgrib par yang mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not suitable that it obscures that which is in its own place.

original: 'jig pa'i rgyus dngos po myong bar byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'jig pa'i rgyus dngos po myong bar byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The cause of destruction does not experience the thing,üîΩbecause it is not suitable that it experience the thing.

original: med pa'i tshul du khas len pa ma yin par rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa'i tshul du khas len pa ma yin par rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But it is not accepted in the manner of non-existence, because it is beyond conceptualization.

original: dngos po dgag pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig yin na ni dngos po mi byed ces bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po dgag pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig yin na ni dngos po mi byed ces bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were the same essential nature as the negation of entity, then it would not make an entity.

original: de ltar na byed pa po ma yin pa ni rgyu nyid ma yin pas 'jig pa'i rgyu 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: de ltar na byed pa po ma yin pa ni rgyu nyid ma yin pas 'jig pa'i rgyu 'ga' yang med do //
translated: Thus, since it is not a maker, it is not a cause, and so there is no cause of destruction at all.

original: don med pa'i yang phyir te /
analyzed: don med pa'i yang phyir te /
translated: And also because it is pointless.

original: gal te dngos po rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas 'jig pa yin na de la 'jig pa'i rgyu cung zad kyang mi dgos te /
analyzed: gal te dngos po rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas 'jig pa yin na de la 'jig pa'i rgyu cung zad kyang mi dgos te /
translated: If an entity were to be destroyed by way of its own nature, then it would not need any cause of destruction at all,

original: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa kho nas bdag nyid 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa kho nas bdag nyid 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be destroyed by itself, just by way of its own nature.

original: gang zhig gang gi ngo bo nyid yin pa de ni rnag gi rgyu kho na las skye ba na de lta bur 'gyur gyi de'i ngo bor bya ba la rgyu gzhan la mi ltos te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi ngo bo nyid yin pa de ni rnag gi rgyu kho na las skye ba na de lta bur 'gyur gyi de'i ngo bor bya ba la rgyu gzhan la mi ltos te /
translated: Whatever is the own nature of something, when it is produced only by the cause of that, it becomes like that, but in order to make it that nature, it does not depend on another cause,

original: gsal ba dang / gsher ba dang dro ba la sogs pa'i rdzas dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gsal ba dang / gsher ba dang dro ba la sogs pa'i rdzas dang 'dra'o //
translated: like the substances clarity, fluidity, heat, and so on.

original: gsal ba la sogs pa de dag gi bdag nyid du 'byung ba rnams ni yang gsal ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor bya ba'i phyir rgyu gzhan la mi ltos te /
analyzed: gsal ba la sogs pa de dag gi bdag nyid du 'byung ba rnams ni yang gsal ba la sogs pa'i ngo bor bya ba'i phyir rgyu gzhan la mi ltos te /
translated: The elements that arise as the nature of clarity and so on do not depend on other causes to make them the nature of clarity and so on again,

original: de'i bdag nyid la de'i bdag nyid med na bdag nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid la de'i bdag nyid med na bdag nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because if that nature did not exist in that nature, it would follow that it would not exist at all.

original: gal te mi gnas pa'i chos can zhig yin na ni ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo grub pas yang de'i bdag nyid du bya ba'i phyir rgyu gzhan la mi ltos so //
analyzed: gal te mi gnas pa'i chos can zhig yin na ni ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo grub pas yang de'i bdag nyid du bya ba'i phyir rgyu gzhan la mi ltos so //
translated: If it is a phenomenon that does not endure, it does not depend on other causes to make it that nature again, because its nature is established by its own nature.

original: gal te sa bon la sogs pa bzhin du ma nges pa yin no snyam du ste /
analyzed: gal te sa bon la sogs pa bzhin du ma nges pa yin no snyam du ste /
translated: If you think that it is indefinite, like a seed and so on,

original: 'di snyam du sa bon la sogs pa bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin yang chu la sogs pa rgyu gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig gis skyed par mi byed do //
analyzed: 'di snyam du sa bon la sogs pa bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin yang chu la sogs pa rgyu gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir 'ba' zhig gis skyed par mi byed do //
translated: you might think that even though a seed and so on has the nature of producing a sprout, it does not produce it alone because it depends on other causes, such as water.üîΩYou might think that the destruction of things is similar to that.

original: dngos po 'jig pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems na ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po 'jig pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems na ma yin te /
translated: But that is not so.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir la skyed bar byed pa ma yin pa yang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir la skyed bar byed pa ma yin pa yang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its intrinsic reality is that which generates, and that which does not generate is not its intrinsic reality.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gnas skabs de gnyis dngos po tha dad par nges te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gnas skabs de gnyis dngos po tha dad par nges te /
translated: For this very reason, those two states are definitely different things,

original: dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid med pas de'i ngo bo nyid med na phyis bzhin du sngon yang mi skyed par thal bar 'gyur @144b ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid med pas de'i ngo bo nyid med na phyis bzhin du sngon yang mi skyed par thal bar 'gyur @144b ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the intrinsic reality of things does not change, and if it did not have that intrinsic reality, then it would follow that it would not generate later, just as it did not previously.

original: de lta bas na gnas skabs kyi bye brag tha ma gang yin pa de nyid myu gu la sogs pa bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na gnas skabs kyi bye brag tha ma gang yin pa de nyid myu gu la sogs pa bskyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, that very final state of the seed is the intrinsic reality that generates the sprout, etc.

original: sngon gyi gnas skabs na yod pa'i bye brag rnams ni rgyu'i rgyu dag nyid yin pas ma nges pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: sngon gyi gnas skabs na yod pa'i bye brag rnams ni rgyu'i rgyu dag nyid yin pas ma nges pa nyid yin no //
translated: The differences that exist in the prior state are the causes of the seed, and therefore are not ascertained.

original: dngos po skad cig ma rnams la gzhan dang gzhan skye bas gcig nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po skad cig ma rnams la gzhan dang gzhan skye bas gcig nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because things that are momentary are not the same, since they arise as different from one another.

original: gal te lhan cig byed pa de dag tha ma dag nus pa yin na ci'i phyir skyed par mi byed ce na /
analyzed: gal te lhan cig byed pa de dag tha ma dag nus pa yin na ci'i phyir skyed par mi byed ce na /
translated: If the co-operating causes are capable, why don‚Äôt they always produce?

original: skyed par byed pa kho na'o //üîΩ'di la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa kho na'o // 'di la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de /
translated: They do produce,üîΩbecause there is no other state.

original: ngo bo nyid zlog pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te lhan cig byed pa de dag thams cad nus pa'i ngo bo yin la gzhan gyi nye bar sbyor ba ci zhig dgos she na /üîΩdngos po rnams la ni gang gis na 'di gcig pus kyang nus pa na bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes gzhan dag ldog par 'gyur ba rtogs pa sngon du gtong zhing byed pa can dag ni 'ga' yang med pa kho na ste /üîΩsems med par byed pa can rang gi rgyu yongs su gyur pas 'du ba'i chos can dag yin la /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid zlog pa med pa'i phyir ro // gal te lhan cig byed pa de dag thams cad nus pa'i ngo bo yin la gzhan gyi nye bar sbyor ba ci zhig dgos she na / dngos po rnams la ni gang gis na 'di gcig pus kyang nus pa na bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes gzhan dag ldog par 'gyur ba rtogs pa sngon du gtong zhing byed pa can dag ni 'ga' yang med pa kho na ste / sems med par byed pa can rang gi rgyu yongs su gyur pas 'du ba'i chos can dag yin la /
translated: There is no reversal of the intrinsic nature.üîΩIf the co-operating causes are all capable, what need is there for the other?

original: de'i rang bzhin las de lta bur 'gyur bas klan ka btsal bar 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin las de lta bur 'gyur bas klan ka btsal bar 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no entity whatsoever that, having been produced, thinks, ‚ÄúI will not be produced again,‚Äù or that, having been produced, thinks, ‚ÄúI will not be produced again,‚Äù or that, having been produced, thinks, ‚ÄúI will not be produced again,‚Äù or that, having been produced, thinks, ‚ÄúI will not be produced again,‚Äù or that, having been produced, thinks, ‚ÄúI will not be
