translated: It is because the causes of being without a protector, being without a teacher, and so on are refuted,

original: rang gi rgyud la mgon la sogs pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde bas na 'di ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ni sgrub pa dang dgag @165a * //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud la mgon la sogs pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ro // de bas na 'di ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu dag ni sgrub pa dang dgag @165a * //
translated: because things such as a protector do not exist in one‚Äôs continuum.

original: pa'i sgo nas sgra rnams kyis 'jug pa'i yan lag bzhi dang ldan par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: pa'i sgo nas sgra rnams kyis 'jug pa'i yan lag bzhi dang ldan par bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in this way, the terms ‚Äúcause‚Äù and ‚Äúeffect‚Äù are taught to have four modes of engagement, through affirmation and negation.

original: gal te mi stong ba dang rtag pa la sogs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba med pa'i phyir stong ba nyid la sogs pa'i sgra dag la gzhan rnam par gcod pa rjod par byed pa med pa ma yin nam ji ltar brjod ce na /
analyzed: gal te mi stong ba dang rtag pa la sogs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba med pa'i phyir stong ba nyid la sogs pa'i sgra dag la gzhan rnam par gcod pa rjod par byed pa med pa ma yin nam ji ltar brjod ce na /
translated: If the terms ‚Äúemptiness‚Äù and so on do not express the exclusion of other because there is nothing to be eliminated, such as nonemptiness and permanence, and so on, how can they be expressed?

original: stong pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: stong pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúEmptiness‚Äù and so on.

original: brtag pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gang gi grub pa'i mtha' la brten nas brtag pa ci 'dra ba des sbyar cing bkod pa'i mi stong pa dang / rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnam par rtog pa'i blo gang yin pa de la sgro btags pa de rnam par gcad pa'i mi stong pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa kun tu brtag pa rnam par gcad nas stong pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad du byed do
analyzed: brtag pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gang gi grub pa'i mtha' la brten nas brtag pa ci 'dra ba des sbyar cing bkod pa'i mi stong pa dang / rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnam par rtog pa'i blo gang yin pa de la sgro btags pa de rnam par gcad pa'i mi stong pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa kun tu brtag pa rnam par gcad nas stong pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad du byed do
translated: ‚ÄúJust as it is imagined‚Äù means that the mind that imagines the aspects of non-emptiness, permanence, and so on, which is connected to and arranged according to whatever philosophical position, is superimposed. Having eliminated the imagination of all aspects of non-emptiness and so on, the convention of emptiness and so on is made.

original: // ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: // ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgra'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sgra'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says ‚Äúbecause of the word‚Äù and so on.

original: blo'i rtogs pas ni don 'di sgro btags par bya'o zhes kun du rtog pa'o //
analyzed: blo'i rtogs pas ni don 'di sgro btags par bya'o zhes kun du rtog pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the object is superimposed by the understanding of the mind.

original: de bstan pa rnam par 'byed pa 'dres pa med pa'i sgra'i don gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bstan pa rnam par 'byed pa 'dres pa med pa'i sgra'i don gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which has the meaning of the undifferentiated explanation of that is called that.

original: de'i dngos po yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dngos po yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of that thing, that is why.

original: thams cad smos pas ni 'dir dngos por gyur pa gang la yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod do zhes smras pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad smos pas ni 'dir dngos por gyur pa gang la yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yod do zhes smras pa yin no //
translated: By saying all, it is said here that there is an opposing factor for any entity.

original: 'di skad du sgra rnams kyi dngos po'i rang gi mtshan nyid sgrub pa dang / dgag pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di skad du sgra rnams kyi dngos po'i rang gi mtshan nyid sgrub pa dang / dgag pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is taught as follows: The intrinsic identity of entities, sounds, is not established or refuted.

original: 'on kyang sgrub pa dgag pa'i tha snyad thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa'i blo kho nas bstan pa yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //üîΩde bas na mi rtag pa la sogs pa sgra dag la mi rtag pa la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs rtag pa la sogs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang sgrub pa dgag pa'i tha snyad thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa'i blo kho nas bstan pa yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // de bas na mi rtag pa la sogs pa sgra dag la mi rtag pa la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs rtag pa la sogs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: However, all the conventions of establishment and refutation are taught only by the conceptual mind.üîΩTherefore, impermanence and so on are not the objects of negation in the phrase sound is impermanent, and so on.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'i nyes pa'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'i nyes pa'o //
translated: The error of the nonexistence of an opposing factor is as follows: There is no impermanence and so on that is the object of negation in the phrase 'sound is impermanent,' and so on.

original: de brjod pa ni ston pa'o //üîΩsogs pa'i sgras ni bdag med do zhes 'gog pa las /
analyzed: de brjod pa ni ston pa'o // sogs pa'i sgras ni bdag med do zhes 'gog pa las /
translated: The expression of that is the teaching.üîΩ The word and so on also expresses the negation there is no self

original: 'gog pa med do zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yang brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gog pa med do zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa yang brjod pa yin no //
translated: and the negation there is no nonexistence, and so on.

original: blo ngan pa gsal byed pa la sogs pa dag gi rnam par spyod pa dag ste /
analyzed: blo ngan pa gsal byed pa la sogs pa dag gi rnam par spyod pa dag ste /
translated: The conduct of those with bad minds, such as the expounders of clarity,

original: rnam par bsgyings pa dang / 'brel pa med pa zhes bya @165b ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rnam par bsgyings pa dang / 'brel pa med pa zhes bya @165b ba'i bar du'o //
translated: and so on, up to ‚Äúthe one without connection.‚Äù

original: rigs pa'i rjes su 'brangs ba'i blo can ni 'brel pa med pa brjod par mi 'gyur ba de bas na /
analyzed: rigs pa'i rjes su 'brangs ba'i blo can ni 'brel pa med pa brjod par mi 'gyur ba de bas na /
translated: Those with minds that follow reasoning would not speak without connection. Therefore,

original: nyes pa brjod pa de dag btang snyoms su bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: nyes pa brjod pa de dag btang snyoms su bya ba yin gyi /
translated: those faults should be ignored.

original: bsam par 'os pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsam par 'os pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not suitable to think about them. This is the meaning.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In that regard, etc.

original: kyang gi sgra ni rim pa gzhan du sbyar te /
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni rim pa gzhan du sbyar te /
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is applied in another order.

original: spyi'i dngos po gcig gnas pa'i yang rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i dngos po gcig gnas pa'i yang rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of the abiding of a single universal entity.

original: mang po dag ni gsal ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: mang po dag ni gsal ba'i khyad par ro //
translated: Many are the distinctions of manifestation.

original: mnyan pa yang yin la gcig kyang yin pas na mnyan pa gcig go //
analyzed: mnyan pa yang yin la gcig kyang yin pas na mnyan pa gcig go //
translated: Since it is also heard and it is also one, it is the one heard.

original: don du ma 'di la rjod par byed pa yod pas na de ni mnyan pa gcig dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: don du ma 'di la rjod par byed pa yod pas na de ni mnyan pa gcig dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Since it has the expression of this multiple meaning, it possesses the one heard.

original: gal te sgra gcig gis brjod par 'gyur na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te sgra gcig gis brjod par 'gyur na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: if it were expressed by a single word.

original: 'bras bu gcig pa can nyid kyis sam /
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig pa can nyid kyis sam /
translated: Because of having a single effect,

original: spyi gcig gi sgra gcig gi don mang po dag la khyad par cung zhig kyang med do snyam du sems so //
analyzed: spyi gcig gi sgra gcig gi don mang po dag la khyad par cung zhig kyang med do snyam du sems so //
translated: or because of having a single universal, a single word applies to many things without any difference.

original: de nyid ni de gzhan dag las zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid ni de gzhan dag las zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par byed do //
translated: He explains just that in the passage beginning with ‚Äúbecause of being different from those that do not have that as their effect.

original: de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa gzhan dag las tha dad pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i 'bras bu can thams cad la khyad par med pa de'i phyir sgra gcig gis brjod do //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa gzhan dag las tha dad pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i 'bras bu can thams cad la khyad par med pa de'i phyir sgra gcig gis brjod do //
translated: ‚Äù That which is different from those that do not have that as their effect is not different from those that do have that as their effect. Therefore, it is expressed by a single word.

original: 'on kyang gcig gi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang gcig gi gnas pa ste /
translated: However, it is the abode of one,

original: gcig gis 'jug pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: gcig gis 'jug pas kyang ngo //
translated: because it is engaged by one.

original: sgra gcig gis dngos po du ma brjod pa de ltar na 'gal bar 'gyur ba ci yod /
analyzed: sgra gcig gis dngos po du ma brjod pa de ltar na 'gal bar 'gyur ba ci yod /
translated: What contradiction is there in a single word expressing many things in that way?

original: ji ltar 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis mang po dag la sgra gcig pa nyid 'jug pa la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'bras bu gcig pa nyid kyis mang po dag la sgra gcig pa nyid 'jug pa la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as there is no contradiction in a single word applying to many things because of having a single effect,

original: de ltar spyi dngos por gyur pas kyang ngo //üîΩde bas na spyi dngos por gyur pa rtogs pa yang /
analyzed: de ltar spyi dngos por gyur pas kyang ngo // de bas na spyi dngos por gyur pa rtogs pa yang /
translated: Thus, the universal is a real entity.üîΩTherefore, the understanding of the universal as a real entity

original: rigs pa kho na yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pa kho na yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: is indeed reasonable.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni slob dpon gyi yin te /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni slob dpon gyi yin te /
translated: Here, the master [ƒÄryadeva] says:

original: dmigs pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa ni dmigs par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa ni dmigs par 'dod pa ste /
translated: The desire to apprehend is the desire to observe.

original: dmigs par 'dod pa nyid ni rgyu nyid brjod par 'dod ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: dmigs par 'dod pa nyid ni rgyu nyid brjod par 'dod ces bya ba ni /
translated: The desire to observe is the desire to express the cause.

original: byed pa po dang byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba kho na bsdu'o //
analyzed: byed pa po dang byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba kho na bsdu'o //
translated: This includes the desire to express the agent and the desire to express the action.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa'i spyi ni gsal ba ma gtogs par mi dmigs pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dag gi don yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa'i spyi ni gsal ba ma gtogs par mi dmigs pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dag gi don yin no //
translated: The universal that has the characteristic of being observed does not exist, because it is not observed apart from the particulars. This is the meaning of the verse.

original: mi dmigs pa nyid du khas blangs pa ni de mthong ba la brten pa ste /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa nyid du khas blangs pa ni de mthong ba la brten pa ste /
translated: The acceptance of non-observation is based on seeing that.

original: spyi mthong ba la brten pa'o //
analyzed: spyi mthong ba la brten pa'o //
translated: It is based on seeing the universal.

original: sgra dang ngo bo shes pa la @166a * //
analyzed: sgra dang ngo bo shes pa la @166a * //
translated: The cognition of sound and form

original: sogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: sogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù should be applied here.

original: don mang po dag la brjod pa gcig gi sgra yin la /
analyzed: don mang po dag la brjod pa gcig gi sgra yin la /
translated: A single word can refer to many things.

original: rnam pa 'dra bar shes pa ni ngo shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa 'dra bar shes pa ni ngo shes pa'o //
translated: Recognition is the cognition of something as being of a similar type.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni spyi rten gsal ba la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni spyi rten gsal ba la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù should be understood to include the following: ‚ÄúThe universal cannot be said to be based on the individual.‚Äù

original: bdag nyid ma dmigs par gyur na dmigs pa'i rgyur 'gyur na sgra dang ngo shes pa ni gzhan la 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid ma dmigs par gyur na dmigs pa'i rgyur 'gyur na sgra dang ngo shes pa ni gzhan la 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: If the self were the cause of perception, then the word and recognition would not be the causes of the cognition of the self.

original: mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù should be understood to include the following:üîΩ‚ÄúThe word and recognition would not be the causes of the cognition of the self.‚Äù

original: sogs pa'i sgra 'dis kyang sngar bshad pa'i nyes pa gzhan dag kyang gzung ba yin te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra 'dis kyang sngar bshad pa'i nyes pa gzhan dag kyang gzung ba yin te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúand so on‚Äù should be understood to include the following:

original: gzhan gyis kyang gzhan dag dang mtshungs pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang gzhan dag dang mtshungs pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: ‚ÄúThe self would not be the cause of the cognition of the self.‚Äù

original: de dang ldan pa dag tu ni 'gyur te zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du rigs ni bzhon pa dang bzho ba la sogs pa 'ga' la yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa dag tu ni 'gyur te zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du rigs ni bzhon pa dang bzho ba la sogs pa 'ga' la yang nye bar gnas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad du /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: rigs kyi rnam par rtog pa dag la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod pa de bas na /
analyzed: rigs kyi rnam par rtog pa dag la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma yod pa de bas na /
translated: There is a valid cognition that refutes the conception of the universal.

original: de'i rgyu can gyis sgra la sogs pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i rgyu can gyis sgra la sogs pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that sound and so on are produced by that,

original: 'bras bu gcig pa can nyid la ni 'gal ba med pa'i phyir des byas pa nyid kyi sgra dang ngo shes pa la sogs pa rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu gcig pa can nyid la ni 'gal ba med pa'i phyir des byas pa nyid kyi sgra dang ngo shes pa la sogs pa rigs pa yin no //
translated: but it is reasonable to say that sound and so on are recognized as being produced by the universal because there is no contradiction in their having the same effect.

original: sun 'byin pa gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sun 'byin pa gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate another refutation, he says, ‚ÄúMoreover, if the universal . . . ‚Äù and so on.

original: spyi dngos por gyur pa 'dod pas bdag nyid kyis rten du ma la de gnas par 'dod par bya ste /
analyzed: spyi dngos por gyur pa 'dod pas bdag nyid kyis rten du ma la de gnas par 'dod par bya ste /
translated: Since the universal is asserted to be a real entity, it must be accepted that it subsists in many individual things.

original: de bas na gnas pa med pa dag ni rten gyi sgra la sogs pa dag gi rgyur mi rigs so //
analyzed: de bas na gnas pa med pa dag ni rten gyi sgra la sogs pa dag gi rgyur mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that the non-enduring is the cause of the terms ‚Äúenduring‚Äù and so on.

original: rang gi rten la gnas pa'i spyi de yang brten pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang gi rten la gnas pa'i spyi de yang brten pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, that universal which endures in its own basis would not be dependent.

original: de'i stobs kyis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i stobs kyis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it endures by its own power.

original: rten gyi stobs kyis dmigs pa ni gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: rten gyi stobs kyis dmigs pa ni gsal ba yin te /
translated: That which is observed by the power of its basis is clear.

original: de la gnas par 'gyur na de gnyis ka yang spyi de la mi rigs so //
analyzed: de la gnas par 'gyur na de gnyis ka yang spyi de la mi rigs so //
translated: If it endured in that, it would not be tenable that both are the universal.

original: gang gcig po de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: gang gcig po de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains ‚Äúthat which is one‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gcig po de yang spyi dngos por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang gcig po de yang spyi dngos por gyur pa'o //
translated: That which is one is the universal that is an existent.

original: du ma la ste rten la gnas pa na'o //
analyzed: du ma la ste rten la gnas pa na'o //
translated: In many, that is, in the bases, it endures.

original: mnyan pa gcig 'jug par byed pa ni rang gi rten la 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mnyan pa gcig 'jug par byed pa ni rang gi rten la 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: It is engaged in one, that is, it is engaged in its own basis.

original: de ni spyi'o rten gcig la 'jug pa 'di gang yin zhes dri ba bkod nas bdag nyid brtan pa gnyis byed pa ni /
analyzed: de ni spyi'o rten gcig la 'jug pa 'di gang yin zhes dri ba bkod nas bdag nyid brtan pa gnyis byed pa ni /
translated: Having set forth the question, ‚ÄúWhat is this engagement in one basis?‚Äù he himself provides the answer:

original: dper na zhes bya ba la @166b sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba la @166b sogs pa smos te /
translated: For example, and so on.

original: yang na spyi'i sgra ni spong bar byed /
analyzed: yang na spyi'i sgra ni spong bar byed /
translated: Or else, the general term is abandoned.

original: 'jug pa 'di la 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'jug pa 'di la 'ga' yang med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: There is no one at all who engages in this. This is the meaning.

original: de ltar gnas pa ni rang gi rten la brten pa yin par 'gyur te dper na 'khar gzhong ste rten la rgyu shug gi 'bras bu gnas pa lta bu'am /
analyzed: de ltar gnas pa ni rang gi rten la brten pa yin par 'gyur te dper na 'khar gzhong ste rten la rgyu shug gi 'bras bu gnas pa lta bu'am /
translated: Thus, the universal would be based on its own basis, just as, for example, jujube fruit is based on a plate, which is its basis.

original: spyi de'i rten la gnas pa ni gsal ba yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: spyi de'i rten la gnas pa ni gsal ba yin par 'gyur te /
translated: Or else, the basis of the universal would be the manifestation,

original: rten de rnams kyis gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten de rnams kyis gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because those bases would be indicated by the manifestation.

original: de la gal te gnas pa brten pa nyid yin par 'dod pa de'i tshe gsal ba de'i rten nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: de la gal te gnas pa brten pa nyid yin par 'dod pa de'i tshe gsal ba de'i rten nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
translated: If you assert that the universal is based on its own basis, then you must assert that the manifestation is the basis of the universal.

original: rtag pa yang spyir khas blangs pa de'i phyir rten rnams kyi phan btags pa med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis rten du 'dod pa'i gsal ba dag ni rtag pa'i rten ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa yang spyir khas blangs pa de'i phyir rten rnams kyi phan btags pa med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis rten du 'dod pa'i gsal ba dag ni rtag pa'i rten ma yin no //
translated: Because you accept that the universal is permanent, the manifestation that is asserted to be its basis is not the basis of the permanent universal, because the universal is not benefited by the bases.

original: rtag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: rtag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with ‚ÄúPermanence, etc.‚Äù

original: 'on te brtag par mi 'dod pa de'i tshe yang mi rtag pa nyid ni gzhan dang gzhan las skyes pa ste /
analyzed: 'on te brtag par mi 'dod pa de'i tshe yang mi rtag pa nyid ni gzhan dang gzhan las skyes pa ste /
translated: But if you do not accept that it is investigated, then impermanence is produced from one thing and another,

original: cig shos dang cig shos las skyes pa'i phyir dang / spyi du ma nyid ni du ma nyid kyi phyir dang / khyad par bzhin du ste /
analyzed: cig shos dang cig shos las skyes pa'i phyir dang / spyi du ma nyid ni du ma nyid kyi phyir dang / khyad par bzhin du ste /
translated: because it is produced from one thing and another, and because the universal is many, because of being many, and because of being like a particular.

original: khyad par rnams dang 'dra bar spyi de la shes pa gcig dang mi ldan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: khyad par rnams dang 'dra bar spyi de la shes pa gcig dang mi ldan pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the universal does not possess a single cognition, like particulars.

original: shes pa gcig dang mi ldan pa'i rgyu'i phyir rtag pa ni spyir 'dod de zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: shes pa gcig dang mi ldan pa'i rgyu'i phyir rtag pa ni spyir 'dod de zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of not possessing a single cognition, it is asserted to be permanent.

original: rtag pa la yang ci zhig byed pa na ;
analyzed: rtag pa la yang ci zhig byed pa na ;
translated: But what function does a permanent thing perform?

original: rten de gzhir 'gyur ba med pa kho na yin no zhes bsams so //
analyzed: rten de gzhir 'gyur ba med pa kho na yin no zhes bsams so //
translated: It is only the basis of the action of the thing that is dependent on it.

original: phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ni rten ma yin gyi 'on kyang rten de la spyi de'i 'phrod pa 'du ba yin pa'i phyir ro /üîΩ// / bam po bcu drug pa /
analyzed: phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ni rten ma yin gyi 'on kyang rten de la spyi de'i 'phrod pa 'du ba yin pa'i phyir ro /üîΩ// / bam po bcu drug pa /
translated: It is not a basis because it benefits, but rather because the universal is connected to that basis.

original: phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid med pa la ni 'phrod pa 'du ba mi srid pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid med pa la ni 'phrod pa 'du ba mi srid pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that contact is impossible when there is no object of action and agent, he says:üîΩContact is not tenable.

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩrten dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni pha rol po'i yin te /
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / rten dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni pha rol po'i yin te /
translated: The opponent says:üîΩThe basis and the based.

original: yul tha dad pa med par grub pa ni tha mi dad par grub pa dag ste /
analyzed: yul tha dad pa med par grub pa ni tha mi dad par grub pa dag ste /
translated: The basis and the based are established as not different.

original: de dag gi rten dang brten pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de'i 'phrod pa 'du ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gi rten dang brten pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de'i 'phrod pa 'du ba'o //
translated: Contact is the basis and the based of those.

original: phan 'dogs par mi byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba ste /
analyzed: phan 'dogs par mi byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba ste /
translated: The proponent of the tenets says:

original: phan 'dogs par mi byed pa'i rten te /
analyzed: phan 'dogs par mi byed pa'i rten te /
translated: The basis of that which does not benefit.

original: gzhi de nyid ni 'dir bsam par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhi de nyid ni 'dir bsam par bya ba yin no //
translated: That very basis is what is to be considered here.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩshin tu @167a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / shin tu @167a * //
translated: Why is that?

original: thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is utterly absurd.

original: gal te phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa yang rten nyid du 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa yang rten nyid du 'dod na /
translated: If that which does not benefit is asserted to be the basis,

original: de'i tshe thams cad thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i tshe thams cad thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur na /
translated: If that were so, then everything would be the basis of everything.

original: de ltar yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin no //
translated: But that is not the case.

original: de'i phyir 'phrod pa 'du ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'phrod pa 'du ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúThe contact of things, etc.‚Äù

original: tha mi dad par grub pa dag ni 'phrod pa 'du ba dag yin te /
analyzed: tha mi dad par grub pa dag ni 'phrod pa 'du ba dag yin te /
translated: Things that are established as not different are in contact,

original: dper na brtsam par bya ba dang / rtsom pa po dag lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na brtsam par bya ba dang / rtsom pa po dag lta bu'o //
translated: like the object of an action and the agent.

original: tha dad par grub pa dag ni ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: tha dad par grub pa dag ni ldan pa yin te /
translated: Things that are established as different are related,

original: dper na me dang du ba dag lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na me dang du ba dag lta bu'o //
translated: like fire and smoke.

original: don gcig pa 'phrod pa dang ldan pa ni don gcig la 'phrod pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: don gcig pa 'phrod pa dang ldan pa ni don gcig la 'phrod pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Things that are related and have the same object have the same object.

original: dper na rdzas gcig la gzugs dang ro dag lta bu'am /
analyzed: dper na rdzas gcig la gzugs dang ro dag lta bu'am /
translated: For example, form and taste are related and have the same object in one substance.

original: rdzas gcig la rgyu dag ni 'phrod pa dang 'du ba yin te /üîΩdper na lus la rkang pa dang lag pa lta bu dag go //
analyzed: rdzas gcig la rgyu dag ni 'phrod pa dang 'du ba yin te / dper na lus la rkang pa dang lag pa lta bu dag go //
translated: Or, cause and effect are related and have the same object in one substance.üîΩFor example, feet and hands are related and have the same object in the body.

original: sogs pa'i sgra ni rje khol nyid kyi 'brel pa la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgra ni rje khol nyid kyi 'brel pa la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the relation of master and slave, etc.

original: dngos por gyur pa'i 'brel pa'am /
analyzed: dngos por gyur pa'i 'brel pa'am /
translated: The relation of things is either

original: dngos po dag gi 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni go rims bzhin du khyad par gyi bsdu ba'am /
analyzed: dngos po dag gi 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni go rims bzhin du khyad par gyi bsdu ba'am /
translated: The so called relation of entities is the inclusion of particulars in the universal.

original: drug pa'i bsdu ba'o /
analyzed: drug pa'i bsdu ba'o /
translated: The so-called ‚Äúrelation of entities‚Äù is the relation of inclusion in the order of the particular or the sixth case.

original: dngos po smos pa ni rtog pas byas pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po smos pa ni rtog pas byas pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mention of ‚Äúentities‚Äù is for the purpose of refuting the thesis that the relation is a mental construct.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to prove that the relation of cause and effect is not different from the entities, cause and effect, he says,

original: gcig la gcig gam zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩgcig la gcig te /
analyzed: gcig la gcig gam zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / gcig la gcig te /
translated: ‚Äúone to the other,‚Äù etc.

original: phan tshun nam rten du mngon par 'dod pa gzhan gyis phan btags pa med pa'o //
analyzed: phan tshun nam rten du mngon par 'dod pa gzhan gyis phan btags pa med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne to the other‚Äù means mutually, i.e., as a support, without the help of another.

original: phan btags pa med pa ni rag lus pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: phan btags pa med pa ni rag lus pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Without the help of another, there is no dependence, because there is no dependence on a cause.

original: ltos pa med pa'i rgyu'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyi 'brel pa dag kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i rgyu'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyi 'brel pa dag kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, the relation of all entities is not different from the relation of cause and effect.

original: rten gyis phan btags pa yod du zin kyang brten pa dag ni gcig phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa'i dngos po med pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rten gyis phan btags pa yod du zin kyang brten pa dag ni gcig phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa'i dngos po med pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Even if there is benefit conferred by the support, is it not the case that there is no entity that is the supported and that which is to be benefited and that which benefits?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gcig la gcig gam gzhan dag gi ces gnyi ga bkod ce na /
analyzed: gcig la gcig gam gzhan dag gi ces gnyi ga bkod ce na /
translated: If it is said that it is because of the mutual relationship or because of the relationship with others,

original: de ni bden te 'on kyang gal te gzhan mngon sum du phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa de ltar na yang /
analyzed: de ni bden te 'on kyang gal te gzhan mngon sum du phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa de ltar na yang /
translated: that is true. But even if the other is not directly benefiting,

analyzed: rgyu gcig la ltos pa nyid las brgyud pas kyang 'brel pa kun du rtog pa yin pa'i phyir @167b bkod pa yin no //
translated: because it is related to the same cause, the relationship is imagined through the indirect connection.

original: gal te yang phan tshun phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa'i dngos po ni /üîΩdon gcig la 'phrod pa 'du bdag tu mi 'dod ce na /
analyzed: gal te yang phan tshun phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa'i dngos po ni / don gcig la 'phrod pa 'du bdag tu mi 'dod ce na /
translated: If the relationship of that which is to be benefited and that which benefits is not accepted as being in the same object,üîΩthen the mutual relationship and the relationship with others would not be established.

original: gal te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so /
analyzed: gal te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so /
translated: If it is said that the relationship of that which is to be benefited and that which benefits is not accepted as being in the same object,üîΩthen the mutual relationship and the relationship with others would not be established.

original: de bas na rten gcig gis phan 'dogs par byed pa'i dngos po med pa la /
analyzed: de bas na rten gcig gis phan 'dogs par byed pa'i dngos po med pa la /
translated: Therefore, in the absence of the entity that is the support and that which is to be benefited,

analyzed: gang gi phyir rang gi rten las don gcig la 'phrod pa 'du ba dag ni gdon mi za bar phan 'dogs par byed pa'i rang gi rten gyis byas pa yin pa de bas na / 'phrod pa 'du ba dag ni bdag nyid la phan par byed pa ste /

original: rten dang bcas pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po gang yin pa des byas shing des sbyar ba kho na rag lus pa'i 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: rten dang bcas pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po gang yin pa des byas shing des sbyar ba kho na rag lus pa'i 'brel pa yin no //
translated: The relation of dependence is that which is produced and that which is applied by the entity of cause and effect that has a basis.

original: gang gi phyir phan 'dogs pa'i sgo nas rten la sogs pa'i dngos po yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phan 'dogs pa'i sgo nas rten la sogs pa'i dngos po yin pa de bas na /
translated: Since it is the entity of basis, etc., in terms of benefit,

original: khra bo la sogs pa'i rten 'di ni spyi ltos pa med par rang gi bdag nyid spyi'i rang bzhin la phan par mi byed pas na rten zhes bya ba des ni g-yar por byas pa'i rgyan lta bu'o //
analyzed: khra bo la sogs pa'i rten 'di ni spyi ltos pa med par rang gi bdag nyid spyi'i rang bzhin la phan par mi byed pas na rten zhes bya ba des ni g-yar por byas pa'i rgyan lta bu'o //
translated: this basis of variegation, etc., is not a benefit to the nature of generality without relying on generality, and therefore it is called ‚Äúbasis.‚Äù It is like a borrowed ornament.

original: 'dis brgyan pas na zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas rgyan ni spras pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis brgyan pas na zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas nas rgyan ni spras pa'o //
translated: The ornament is the adornment that is taken in the sense of ‚Äúit is adorned by this.‚Äù

original: de dang g-yar po byas pa'i sgra las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba bya'o //
analyzed: de dang g-yar po byas pa'i sgra las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba bya'o //
translated: The verbal derivation of the word ‚Äúborrowed‚Äù should be applied to this.

original: dper na dbul po bdag nyid la med par gzhan dag las 'phral du g-yar po byas pa'i rgyan lta bur spyi'i rten yang spyi'i don gyi rten yin pa de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: dper na dbul po bdag nyid la med par gzhan dag las 'phral du g-yar po byas pa'i rgyan lta bur spyi'i rten yang spyi'i don gyi rten yin pa de dang 'dra'o //
translated: For example, a poor person who does not have something borrows it from others for a short time and uses it as an ornament. The basis of generality is like that. The basis of the meaning of generality is like that.

original: yang na rgyan gyi sgra gsum pa'i bsdu ba dang ngo bo bsgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: yang na rgyan gyi sgra gsum pa'i bsdu ba dang ngo bo bsgrub pa yin te /
translated: Or else, the term ‚Äúornament‚Äù is a third case tatpurusa compound, meaning ‚Äúthat which is to be ornamented.‚Äù

original: ji ltar g-yar por byas pa'i rgyan lta bur brgyan par byas pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar g-yar por byas pa'i rgyan lta bur brgyan par byas pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as one is ornamented with borrowed ornaments,

original: spyi rten ni gzhan la g-yar po byas pa dang 'dra bar rten gyi dngos po bstan pa @168a * //
analyzed: spyi rten ni gzhan la g-yar po byas pa dang 'dra bar rten gyi dngos po bstan pa @168a * //
translated: the general basis is taught to be the basis, like something borrowed.

original: yin gyi / dngos por gnas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yin gyi / dngos por gnas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not a real entity,

original: des phan btags pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des phan btags pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not benefit.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni pha rol po'i yin te /
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni pha rol po'i yin te /
translated: The opponent‚Äôs response to this is stated in the lines beginning ‚ÄúBut if you say that the bowl is not produced by the jujubes. . . .

original: 'khar gzhong ni rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag gis skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'khar gzhong ni rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag gis skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The bowl is not produced by the jujubes,

original: de dag ni rang gi rgyu kho na las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni rang gi rgyu kho na las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the jujubes are produced from their own causes.

original: de bas na 'brel pa thams cad kho na ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de ni ma nges pa kho na yin snyam du sems pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'brel pa thams cad kho na ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po las tha dad pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de ni ma nges pa kho na yin snyam du sems pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the statement that all relations are not different from the relation of cause and effect is not established.‚Äù

original: ltung ba'i tshul can gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba yin te /
analyzed: ltung ba'i tshul can gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba yin te /
translated: The proponent of the system of the transference of the mode of the fall is the proponent of tenets.

original: yul gzhan du rnam par 'pho ba'i ngag tshul can gyi ltung ba'i tshul can rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i de'i yul skyed pa rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i skad cig ma nye bar len par 'gyur ba'i 'khar gzhong dang 'brel pa'i yul gang yin pa'i yulüîΩde nyid du skyed pa ni gzhan du 'gro bar mi byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yul gzhan du rnam par 'pho ba'i ngag tshul can gyi ltung ba'i tshul can rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i de'i yul skyed pa rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i skad cig ma nye bar len par 'gyur ba'i 'khar gzhong dang 'brel pa'i yul gang yin pa'i yul de nyid du skyed pa ni gzhan du 'gro bar mi byed pa'i phyir /
translated: The mode of the fall is the mode of speech that transfers to another place. The mode of the fall is the capacity of the vessel that is the basis of the generation of the fruit of the jujube tree, and so on, that is the object that is the basis of the arising of the moment of the fruit of the jujube tree.üîΩThe object that is the basis of the generation of the fruit of the jujube tree is not the object that is the basis of the arising of the moment of the fruit of the jujube tree.

original: 'di ni rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa brten pa dag la rten du 'dod pa'i 'khar gzhong la sogs pa dag gi nus pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa brten pa dag la rten du 'dod pa'i 'khar gzhong la sogs pa dag gi nus pa yin no //
translated: This is the capacity of the vessel that is asserted to be the basis of the supported fruit of the jujube tree, and so on.

original: rjas  lci ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: rjas  lci ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with heavy earth, and so on.

original: ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin nyid kyis so //
translated: The essence is the nature itself.

original: yul mi 'dra ba can gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya te /
analyzed: yul mi 'dra ba can gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya te /
translated: That which has a different object is called that.

original: rang bzhin gyis sgra la ltos par gyur pa na yang go bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'bru mang po pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis sgra la ltos par gyur pa na yang go bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir 'bru mang po pa yin no //
translated: And when it is dependent on sound by nature, it is a bahuvrƒ´hi compound because it is that which causes understanding.

original: de lta bur gyur pa yang yin la 'bras bu yang de yin pas zhes bya ba ni las 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa yang yin la 'bras bu yang de yin pas zhes bya ba ni las 'dzin pa'o //
translated: And it is such and it is the result, thus it is a bahuvrƒ´hi compound.

original: 'bras bu yang rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu yang rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa ste /
translated: The result is the fruit of the buck-eye tree and so on.

original: skad cig ma phyi ma phyi mas bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma phyi ma phyi mas bsdus pa'o //
translated: It is included in the later moment.

original: de skye ba de nyid kyi chos kyi ngo bo gang la rdzas lci ba rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i skad cig ma snga mas bsdus pa yod pa'i yul 'dra bar 'bras bu skyed pa nyid ni rten gyis byas pa ste /
analyzed: de skye ba de nyid kyi chos kyi ngo bo gang la rdzas lci ba rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i skad cig ma snga mas bsdus pa yod pa'i yul 'dra bar 'bras bu skyed pa nyid ni rten gyis byas pa ste /
translated: The result that is similar to the object that has the nature of the dharma that is born from it, the heavy substance that is included in the earlier moment of the buck-eye fruit and so on, is produced by the support.

original: bdag nyid la yang tshul mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba ni rten gyis byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bdag nyid la yang tshul mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba ni rten gyis byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the result that is similar to itself is produced by the support.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de bas na rgya shug gi 'bras bu phyis 'byung ba'i nye bar len pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i skad cig ma gang @168b yin pa de'i lhan cig byed pa'i 'khar gzhong ni de nyid la ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de bas na rgya shug gi 'bras bu phyis 'byung ba'i nye bar len pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i skad cig ma gang @168b yin pa de'i lhan cig byed pa'i 'khar gzhong ni de nyid la ste /
translated: Therefore, the dish that is the cooperative condition of the moment of the grape that is the cause of the later arising of the grape is just that,

original: nye bar len pa'i yul gyi skad cig ma nyid la rgya shug gi 'bras bu skyed pa na 'khar gzhong la brten zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i yul gyi skad cig ma nyid la rgya shug gi 'bras bu skyed pa na 'khar gzhong la brten zhes bya'o //
translated: that very moment of the object that is the appropriated object. When the grape is produced, it is said to be based on the dish.

original: gzhan du na gal te 'khar gzhong gis rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag la ji skad du bshad pa'i phan pa mi byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan du na gal te 'khar gzhong gis rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag la ji skad du bshad pa'i phan pa mi byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: Otherwise, if the dish does not assist the grapes as explained,

original: 'khar gzhong 'di la 'bras bu dag ces bya ba de lta bu'i tha snyad du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'khar gzhong 'di la 'bras bu dag ces bya ba de lta bu'i tha snyad du mi 'gyur te /
translated: then the expression ‚Äúgrapes in the dish‚Äù would not be used.

original: rten nges pa'i tha snyad ni rgyu mtshan med par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten nges pa'i tha snyad ni rgyu mtshan med par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is not tenable that the expression of a definite basis is without a reason.

original: de ni 'dir 'khar gzhong 'di la rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag ces bya ba'i phan pa byed pas byas pa'i tha snyad ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni 'dir 'khar gzhong 'di la rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag ces bya ba'i phan pa byed pas byas pa'i tha snyad ni ma yin no //
translated: The expression ‚Äúpomegranates‚Äù is not applied to this winnowing basket on the basis of its function of benefiting.

original: 'o na ci yin 'khar gzhong dang 'bras bu dag gi ldan pa gang yin pa des byas pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin 'khar gzhong dang 'bras bu dag gi ldan pa gang yin pa des byas pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the expression ‚Äúpomegranates‚Äù is applied to the winnowing basket on the basis of the possession of pomegranates,

original: de dag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'o //
translated: then the master says, ‚Äúthose very pomegranates.‚Äù

original: de dag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag gi'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag gi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThose very pomegranates‚Äù refers to the winnowing basket and the pomegranates.

original: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /üîΩyang tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni / yang tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yod pa ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúPossession‚Äù meansüîΩthat the basis of the expression ‚Äúpomegranates‚Äù is not a real entity.

original: phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The intended meaning is that the basis of the expression ‚Äúpomegranates‚Äù is not a real entity because there is no real entity that is the object of the expression ‚Äúpomegranates.‚Äù

original: 'di dag gis zhes bya ba ni pha rol po dag gi ste /
analyzed: 'di dag gis zhes bya ba ni pha rol po dag gi ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThese‚Äù refers to the opponents.

original: 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu de dag gis ldan pa bskyed pa'i phyir de dag la ldan pa zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu de dag gis ldan pa bskyed pa'i phyir de dag la ldan pa zhes bya ba'am /
translated: The expression ‚Äúpomegranates‚Äù is applied to the winnowing basket because the winnowing basket produces the possession of pomegranates.

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu gnyis pa ste /

original: 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag ni ldan pa'i 'phrod pa 'du ba yin pa'i phyir de dag la ldan pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag ni ldan pa'i 'phrod pa 'du ba yin pa'i phyir de dag la ldan pa zhes bya'o //
translated: A bowl and jujubes are a collection that is suitable to be combined. Therefore, they are called a combination.

original: gnyis po kho nas ldan pa bskyed pa dang / gnyi ga la 'phrod pa 'du bar pha rol pos bstan pa na /
analyzed: gnyis po kho nas ldan pa bskyed pa dang / gnyi ga la 'phrod pa 'du bar pha rol pos bstan pa na /
translated: When the opponent teaches that a combination is generated by just the two,

original: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas mi bzod pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa de ni ldan pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' smra bas mi bzod pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa de ni ldan pa'o //

original: gcig nyid la ni 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu la'o //
analyzed: gcig nyid la ni 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu la'o //
translated: If a bowl and jujubes are a single thing,

translated: is a combination that is suitable to be combined not generated?üîΩA bowl and jujubes are a single thing.

analyzed: 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu gcig gis so //
translated: If a bowl and jujubes are a single thing,üîΩis a combination that is suitable to be combined not generated?üîΩA bowl and jujubes are a single thing.üîΩIf a bowl and jujubes are a single thing,üîΩis a combination that is suitable to be combined not generated?üîΩA bowl and jujubes are a single thing.üîΩIf a bowl and jujubes are a single thing,

analyzed: gal te 'khar gzhong dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i dngos po dag ni ldan pa skyed pa'am /
translated: is a combination that is suitable to be combined not generated?üîΩA bowl and jujubes are a single thing.üîΩIf a bowl and jujubes are a single thing,üîΩis a combination that is suitable to be combined not generated?üîΩA bowl and jujubes are a single thing.üîΩIf a bowl and jujubes are a single thing,üîΩis a combination that is suitable to be combined not generated?üîΩA bowl and jujubes are a single thing.üîΩIf a bowl and jujubes are a single thing,üîΩis a combination that is suitable to be combined not generated?

original: rten gyi dngos por nye bar 'gro bar nus pa'i rang bzhin so so ba de'i phyir ci'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan la ltos zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dri ba po'i bsams pa'o //
analyzed: rten gyi dngos por nye bar 'gro bar nus pa'i rang bzhin so so ba de'i phyir ci'i phyir gzhan dang gzhan la ltos zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dri ba po'i bsams pa'o //
translated: The questioner thinks: ‚ÄúWhy do you ask, ‚ÄòWhy do they depend on other things?‚Äô because they have different natures that are capable of becoming the basis of the effect.‚Äù

analyzed: @169a * // gal te so so'i nus pa med la de gnyis phan tshun bcas pa nyid ni nus pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that each is incapable by itself, but they are capable when they are mutually combined,

original: tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: then NƒÅgƒÅrjuna says, ‚ÄúIf they are different,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'khar gzhong rgya shug gi dngos po tha dad pa'i nus pa med pa de ni phan tshun bcas pa yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: 'khar gzhong rgya shug gi dngos po tha dad pa'i nus pa med pa de ni phan tshun bcas pa yin du zin kyang /

analyzed: de 'dra ba kho na nus pa med pa de nyid de skad cig ma nyid ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bsams pa'o //

original: skad cig ma so so tha dad pa ni nus pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: skad cig ma so so tha dad pa ni nus pa med pa yin la /

original: phyis lhan cig byed pas byas pa'i khyad par dang bcas pa dag ni nus pa yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: phyis lhan cig byed pas byas pa'i khyad par dang bcas pa dag ni nus pa yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: but later, when they are combined with the differences produced by the cooperating conditions, they are capable. Therefore there is no contradiction.
