original: 'khor gzhong rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang bcas pa dag ni ldan pa bskyed pa 'am /
analyzed: 'khor gzhong rgya shug gi 'bras bu dang bcas pa dag ni ldan pa bskyed pa 'am /
translated: The jujube fruit is the object possessed by the pot because it is the object possessed by the pot.üîΩThe pot is the basis of the jujube fruit because it

original: rten gyi ngo bo la nye bar 'gro ba la nus pa yin gyi yan gar ba dag la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rten gyi ngo bo la nye bar 'gro ba la nus pa yin gyi yan gar ba dag la ni ma yin no //
translated: It is capable of approaching the nature of the basis, but not of the individual.

original: bskyed par bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni slob dpon gyi yin te /
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni slob dpon gyi yin te /
translated: The master says, ‚Äúthat which is to be generated‚Äù and so on.

original: rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa nyid 'khar gzhong la sogs pa dag ni skyed par byed pa ma yin pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa nyid 'khar gzhong la sogs pa dag ni skyed par byed pa ma yin pa nyid yin na /
translated: If the jujube fruit is not to be generated, the bowl and so on are not the generator.

original: phan par byed pa 'di yang ci yin te /
analyzed: phan par byed pa 'di yang ci yin te /
translated: What is this benefit?

original: yod pa yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: yod pa yin pa kho na'o //
translated: It is only existent.

original: gal te ji ltar bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa nyid kho na nyid ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa nyid kho na nyid ma yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how it is not the generator and the generated,

original: rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te ;
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te ;
translated: the master says, ‚Äúits own nature‚Äù and so on.

original: rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i rnag gi ngo bo rang gi rgyu gzhan kho na las grub pa'i phyir dang / 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag ni skyed par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i rnag gi ngo bo rang gi rgyu gzhan kho na las grub pa'i phyir dang / 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir rgya shug gi 'bras bu dag ni skyed par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: Because the nature of the jujube fruit is established from its own cause alone, and because it is not the effect, the jujube fruit is not the generator.

original: 'khar gzhong yang skyed par byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so//
analyzed: 'khar gzhong yang skyed par byed pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so//
translated: The meaning is that the dish does not produce the jujube fruit.

original: @169b gzhan dag ni 'khar gzhong la sogs pa la rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni skye bar mi 'dod de /
analyzed: @169b gzhan dag ni 'khar gzhong la sogs pa la rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni skye bar mi 'dod de /
translated: Others do not assert that the essence of the jujube fruit, etc. is produced from the dish, etc.

original: de dag ni rang gi rgyu kho na las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni rang gi rgyu kho na las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are produced from their own causes.üîΩAlthough the dish does not produce the essence of the jujube fruit, it is nevertheless different from it.

original: 'khar gzhong gis rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i ngo bo byed pa ni ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang de las ngo bo gzhan yin no snyam pa de bas na gzhan gyi ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'khar gzhong gis rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i ngo bo byed pa ni ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang de las ngo bo gzhan yin no snyam pa de bas na gzhan gyi ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúIf it is different from it, etc.‚Äù

original: de la zhes bya ba ni brten pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni brten pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn it‚Äù means in the dish.

original: don gzhan gyis byas pa la ni don gzhan gyis phan par byas par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: don gzhan gyis byas pa la ni don gzhan gyis phan par byas par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: That which is produced by one thing is not produced by another thing.

original: rnam pa gnyi ga yang zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo dang gzhan gyi bya ba dag bdag gis bstan ma thag pa'i rnam par 'khar gzhong la sogs pa ni cung zhig kyang byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de dag kyang mang du bstan
analyzed: rnam pa gnyi ga yang zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo dang gzhan gyi bya ba dag bdag gis bstan ma thag pa'i rnam par 'khar gzhong la sogs pa ni cung zhig kyang byed pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de dag kyang mang du bstan
translated: because they are not at all active.

original: to // mang ba'i sgra ni phal che ba'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: to // mang ba'i sgra ni phal che ba'i tshig yin te /
translated: The word ‚Äúmany‚Äù is a word for ‚Äúmost.‚Äù

original: phal cher bshad pas na mang du bstan pa'o //
analyzed: phal cher bshad pas na mang du bstan pa'o //
translated: Since most are explained, they are explained as many.üîΩThis meaning is also explained extensively in the following:

original: don 'di yang 'di de rnams de rnams kyi 'bras bur 'gyur /
analyzed: don 'di yang 'di de rnams de rnams kyi 'bras bur 'gyur /
translated: ‚ÄúThese are the results of those.

original: phan 'dogs gang yin bskyed pa yin //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par bshad do //
analyzed: phan 'dogs gang yin bskyed pa yin // zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par bshad do //
translated: Whatever is helpful is generated.‚Äù

original: gzhan dag ni mang po'i sgra 'dra ba'i don du smra ste /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni mang po'i sgra 'dra ba'i don du smra ste /
translated: Others say that the word ‚Äúmany‚Äù has the meaning of ‚Äúsimilar.‚Äù

original: bshad pa dang 'dra bas na 'dra bar bstan pa te /
analyzed: bshad pa dang 'dra bas na 'dra bar bstan pa te /
translated: Since they are similar to the explanation, they are explained as similar.

original: gong du bshad pa'i rten gyis byas pa'i spyi'i rang gi ngo bo la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / brten pa la phan 'dogs par byed pa 'khar gzhong la sogs pa byas pa 'di ni mtshungs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gong du bshad pa'i rten gyis byas pa'i spyi'i rang gi ngo bo la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / brten pa la phan 'dogs par byed pa 'khar gzhong la sogs pa byas pa 'di ni mtshungs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the benefit that is provided to the general intrinsic nature that is produced by the basis, and the benefit that is provided to the dependent phenomenon, such as the winnowing basket, are the same.

original: de bas na dngos po thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa mjug sdud pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na dngos po thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa mjug sdud pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the phrase ‚Äúall entities‚Äù and so on is a summary.

original: dngos po thams cad kyi 'brel pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni rgyu'i phyir rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi 'brel pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni rgyu'i phyir rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The connection between all entities is that they are established as the entity of cause and effect, because of the cause.

original: gal te de dag gi rnam par dbye bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de dag gi rnam par dbye bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If they were not differentiated,

original: bskyed par bya ba kho na la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba kho na la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: the phrase ‚Äúonly that which is to be produced‚Äù and so on is stated.

original: rgyus byas pa'i 'bras bu las phan 'dogs pa'i khyad par gang yin pa de'i stobs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyus byas pa'i 'bras bu las phan 'dogs pa'i khyad par gang yin pa de'i stobs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the power of the difference in the benefit that is provided to the effect that is produced by the cause.

original: 'di ltar rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam par ltung ba'i tshul can gyis chos can rang gi nye bar len pa'i yul la bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi nye bar mkho bas rten dang brten @170a * //üîΩpa'i ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam par ltung ba'i tshul can gyis chos can rang gi nye bar len pa'i yul la bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi nye bar mkho bas rten dang brten @170a * // pa'i ngo bo yin no //
translated: Thus, the nature of the lamp is that of a support and something supported, characterized by the generation of the object of its own appropriation, by the mode of falling, such as the fruit of the jujube tree, and so on.

original: sgron mas phan par byas pa rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i nus pa rang gi ngo bo bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sgron mas phan par byas pa rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i nus pa rang gi ngo bo bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir //
translated: The nature of the lamp is characterized by the generation of the potential that generates consciousness, which is the benefit that is done.

original: bum pa dang sgron ma la sogs pa dag ni gsal bar bya ba dang / gsal bar byed pa'i 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: bum pa dang sgron ma la sogs pa dag ni gsal bar bya ba dang / gsal bar byed pa'i 'brel pa yin te /
translated: The lamp and so on are the relationship of the object to be clarified and the clarifier.

original: de ltar 'brel pa gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'brel pa gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par sbyar ro //
translated: In that way, other relationships should be applied in a similar way.

original: gang gi phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ma gtogs par dngos po'i 'brel pa yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ma gtogs par dngos po'i 'brel pa yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: Since there is no relationship of entities except for cause and effect,

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: therefore, the statement ‚Äúand so on‚Äù is made.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o 'khar gzhong ni rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i nus pa kho na rten yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o 'khar gzhong ni rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i nus pa kho na rten yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúbecause‚Äù is used. The bowl is the basis of the mere capacity to produce jujubes and so on.

original: gal te spyi'i rten la yang skyed par byed pa'i nus pa nyid kyi rten du yod pa yin no zhes /üîΩde yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te spyi'i rten la yang skyed par byed pa'i nus pa nyid kyi rten du yod pa yin no zhes / de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: If you say that the basis of the universal is the capacity to produce,

original: de zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed ba'i nus pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed ba'i nus pa'o //
translated: then the word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the capacity to produce.üîΩThe word ‚Äúthis‚Äù refers to the universal.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni spyi la'o bskyed par bya ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni spyi la'o bskyed par bya ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: The explanation is that ‚Äúthat‚Äù is the capacity to produce, and ‚Äúthis‚Äù is the universal.

original: rang gi nye bar len pa'i byed pa'i yul kho na la skyed pa byed pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi nye bar len pa'i byed pa'i yul kho na la skyed pa byed pa ste /
translated: The capacity to produce is only in the object that is its own appropriated cause.

original: rten ngo bo gang la skyed par byed pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rten ngo bo gang la skyed par byed pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which has the nature of a basis that has the characteristic of the capacity to produce is called that.

original: de ni bskyed par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni spyi ni rtag pa nyid kyis bskyed par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni bskyed par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni spyi ni rtag pa nyid kyis bskyed par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not something that is produced.

original: de med na yang ste /üîΩrten med na spyi gnas pa'i gtan tshigs kyis so //
analyzed: de med na yang ste / rten med na spyi gnas pa'i gtan tshigs kyis so //
translated: Even if it does not exist,üîΩbecause of the reason that the universal remains without a basis.

original: rten gyi dbang gis gnas min zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: rten gyi dbang gis gnas min zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: It does not remain by the power of the basis.

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed do //
translated: But, etc.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni spyi na'o //üîΩde med na zhes bya ba ni gsal ba med na yang ngo //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni spyi na'o // de med na zhes bya ba ni gsal ba med na yang ngo //
translated: That is, the universal.üîΩEven if it does not exist,

original: spyi ni gsal bas stong pa'i yul gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi ni gsal bas stong pa'i yul gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that is, even if the manifestation does not exist, the universal remains in a place devoid of manifestation.

original: gal te gsal bas stong pa'i yul na spyi med par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te gsal bas stong pa'i yul na spyi med par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: If the universal were not in a place devoid of manifestation,

original: der snga na med pa'i gsal ba skye ba la spyi 'brel par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: der snga na med pa'i gsal ba skye ba la spyi 'brel par mi 'gyur te /
translated: then when a manifestation arises in a place that previously lacked it, the universal would not be related to it.

original: de la gzhan las 'ong ba med de /
analyzed: de la gzhan las 'ong ba med de /
translated: It does not come from another place,

original: bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not an action.

original: yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i gsal ba yang spyi de'i rten yin te /
analyzed: yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i gsal ba yang spyi de'i rten yin te /
translated: The manifestation that exists in different places is also the basis of the universal.

original: yul tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the difference of place.

original: gal te spyi ni gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir yul tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te spyi ni gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir yul tha dad pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the universal is not different in place because it is one,

original: 'on te @170b gsal ba thams cad rigs gcig dang ldan pa yin pas yul gcig pa thob par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: 'on te @170b gsal ba thams cad rigs gcig dang ldan pa yin pas yul gcig pa thob par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: then all manifestations would have the same place because they would all have the same universal.

original: thams cad rigs dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad rigs dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Or else, all would not have the universal.

original: gal te gcig cig ji ltar tha dad pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gcig cig ji ltar tha dad pa yin zhe na /
translated: If you say that one is not different,

original: 'di ni 'di'i nyes pa gzhan yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i nyes pa gzhan yin no //
translated: this is another fault.

original: dngos po ltung ba'i chos can zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan tshigs kyi don ston pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po ltung ba'i chos can zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan tshigs kyi don ston pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the reason is stated in the line ‚Äúbecause of the nature of falling,‚Äù etc.

original: kyang gi sgra ni khas blangs pa ston pa'i don to //
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni khas blangs pa ston pa'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù shows that the universal is accepted.

original: khas blangs su zin kyang spyi la rnam pa 'di rnam par gzhag par mi nus te /
analyzed: khas blangs su zin kyang spyi la rnam pa 'di rnam par gzhag par mi nus te /
translated: Even if it is accepted, this universal cannot be established in this way.

original: spyi ni ltung ba'i chos can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu ni don nye bar dgod pa'o //
analyzed: spyi ni ltung ba'i chos can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu ni don nye bar dgod pa'o //
translated: This is the presentation of the meaning.

original: skyed par byed pa yin pa ni 'jog par byed pa nyid ma yin pa de'i nyid ni 'di la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa yin pa ni 'jog par byed pa nyid ma yin pa de'i nyid ni 'di la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThe producer is not the placer‚Äù and so on is as follows.

original: ltung ba'i gegs byed pa 'jog par byed par khas blangs pa 'di la yang gal te rigs pa 'ga' zhig ltung ba'i gegs byed pa las brgal zhing brtag par mi byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ltung ba'i gegs byed pa 'jog par byed par khas blangs pa 'di la yang gal te rigs pa 'ga' zhig ltung ba'i gegs byed pa las brgal zhing brtag par mi byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: Even in this case, where it is accepted that the producer is the placer, if one does not investigate and analyze whether there is any logic that the producer is the placer,

original: skyed par byed pa ma yin du zin kyang 'jog par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa ma yin du zin kyang 'jog par byed pa yin te /
translated: then even if it is not the producer, it is the placer.

original: rang gi brda'i ngor byas nas zhes bya ba bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi brda'i ngor byas nas zhes bya ba bsams pa yin no //
translated: This is what is thought: ‚ÄúIn dependence on one‚Äôs own conventions.‚Äù

original: 'dir 'jog pa pos byas pa'i gegs byed pa yin pa de na gzhag par bya ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: 'dir 'jog pa pos byas pa'i gegs byed pa yin pa de na gzhag par bya ba'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Here, if the obstruction created by the placer is the nature of what is placed,

original: de las don gzhan nam /
analyzed: de las don gzhan nam /
translated: it would be a different object from that.

original: ltung ba med pa tsam zhes bya ba'i brgal zhing brtag pa srid par 'gyur na /
analyzed: ltung ba med pa tsam zhes bya ba'i brgal zhing brtag pa srid par 'gyur na /
translated: The objection and analysis called ‚Äúmere non-falling‚Äù would be possible.

original: re zhig bdag nyid du gyur pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig bdag nyid du gyur pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But first, it is not the self,

original: de'i rang bzhin gzhan las grub par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gzhan las grub par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because you accept that its nature is established from something else.

original: don gzhan yang ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don gzhan yang ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that it is also not a different object,

original: 'jog pa pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'jog pa pos zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says ‚Äúthe one who places‚Äù and so on.

original: don gzhan nyid khas blangs par 'gyur na ltung ba'i gegs byed pa'i don gzhan du 'gyur ba de nyid la rten 'di nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa ltung ba'i gegs byed pa ci yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan nyid khas blangs par 'gyur na ltung ba'i gegs byed pa'i don gzhan du 'gyur ba de nyid la rten 'di nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa ltung ba'i gegs byed pa ci yin te /
translated: If you accept that it is a different object, then it would be a different object that prevents falling. Since that very thing is applied to the support, what prevents the falling of the jujube fruit and so on?

original: gnod pa byed pa 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod pa byed pa 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no harm at all.

original: de bas na 'khar gzhong la sogs pa la gnas pa'i rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa mi ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsams pa'o /
analyzed: de bas na 'khar gzhong la sogs pa la gnas pa'i rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa mi ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsams pa'o /
translated: Therefore, the jujube fruit and so on that are placed in a basin and so on do not fall.

original: gal te rten gyis byas pa'i ltung ba gegs pa byas pas rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa ltung ma med pa @171a * //üîΩyin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rten gyis byas pa'i ltung ba gegs pa byas pas rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa ltung ma med pa @171a * // yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say: A downfall that is created by a basis is like a jujube fruit, etc. that does not fall because it is prevented from falling.üîΩIf you say: It does not fall because it is prevented from falling,

original: gegs byed pa las mi ltung ba yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gegs byed pa las mi ltung ba yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: then the response is: If it does not fall because it is prevented from falling,üîΩthen it is the same as the previous analysis.

original: gegs byed pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po las rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa mi ltung bar khas blangs pas na /
analyzed: gegs byed pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po las rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa mi ltung bar khas blangs pas na /
translated: Since it is accepted that a jujube fruit, etc. does not fall due to a thing called a ‚Äúprevention,‚Äù

original: brgal zhing brtag par mtshungs pas te /
analyzed: brgal zhing brtag par mtshungs pas te /
translated: then it is the same as the previous analysis.

original: gegs byed pa zhes bya ba'i dngos pos mi ltung bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni ci rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'am don gzhan nyid yin na /
analyzed: gegs byed pa zhes bya ba'i dngos pos mi ltung bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni ci rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'am don gzhan nyid yin na /
translated: If that which is called a ‚Äúprevention‚Äù is a thing that prevents a jujube fruit, etc. from falling, then is it the identity of a jujube fruit, etc. or is it something else?

original: de nyid la 'di nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid la 'di nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa thams cad mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: Since it is applied to that very thing, etc. all of this is the same.

original: 'on te mi ltung ba zhes bya ba'i don des rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa mi ltung bar byas pa de la yang brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te mi ltung ba zhes bya ba'i don des rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa mi ltung bar byas pa de la yang brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa ni /
translated: But if the meaning of ‚Äúnon-falling‚Äù is that the jujube fruit, etc. are made not to fall, then the objection and examination are the same.

original: thug pa med par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: thug pa med par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚Äúthere would be an infinite regress.‚Äù

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyogs gsum pa nye bar bkod pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyogs gsum pa nye bar bkod pa yin te /
translated: ‚Äú Therefore,‚Äù etc. sets forth a third position.

original: ltung ba med pa de gang zhig gis ji ltar byed de /
analyzed: ltung ba med pa de gang zhig gis ji ltar byed de /
translated: By whom and how is that non-falling made?

original: gang gis kyang byas pa med de med pa zhes bya ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba bsams so //
analyzed: gang gis kyang byas pa med de med pa zhes bya ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba bsams so //
translated: It is not made by anyone, because there is no such thing as a non-existent, i.e. nothing that is non-existent.

original: 'o na gal te ji ltar dngos po med pa byed ces bya ba bstan ce na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te ji ltar dngos po med pa byed ces bya ba bstan ce na /
translated: But if it is asked, ‚ÄúHow can a non-existent be made?‚Äù

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúA non-existent,‚Äù etc.

original: dngos po med pa byed ces bya ba'i sgra la dngos po med pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig kyang yod par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa byed ces bya ba'i sgra la dngos po med pa zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig kyang yod par mi 'dod do //
translated: The word ‚Äúnon-existent‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúa non-existent is made‚Äù does not refer to anything that is non-existent.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBecause,‚Äù etc.

original: de ni zhes bya ba dngos po med pa bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos po nyid du 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o ;
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba dngos po med pa bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos po nyid du 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o ;
translated: He thinks that since non-entityness is an activity, it would become an entity.

original: / gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de bas na dngos po med pa byed pa ni dngos po'i bya ba gang yin pa de 'gog pa ston pa yin no //
analyzed: / gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de bas na dngos po med pa byed pa ni dngos po'i bya ba gang yin pa de 'gog pa ston pa yin no //
translated: Since that is so, therefore, the activity of a non-entity is shown to be the cessation of whatever activity of an entity there is.

original: de nyid gsal ba'i phyir dngos por mi byed ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid gsal ba'i phyir dngos por mi byed ces bya ba smos te /
translated: In order to make that clear, he says, ‚ÄúIt does not make an entity.‚Äù

original: dngos por mi byed ces bya ba'i dag 'di'i don ni dngos po med pa byed ces bya ba 'di'i yang de tsam kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos por mi byed ces bya ba'i dag 'di'i don ni dngos po med pa byed ces bya ba 'di'i yang de tsam kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚ÄúIt does not make an entity‚Äù is just the same as the meaning of ‚ÄúIt makes a non-entity.‚Äù

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni ltung ba'i gegs byed pa med pa tsam nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni ltung ba'i gegs byed pa med pa tsam nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú In that case‚Äù means that it is just the absence of an obstruction to falling.

original: 'di ni 'khar gzhong la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'khar gzhong la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú This‚Äù refers to a basin, etc.

original: de'i phyir ni rgyu de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir ni rgyu de'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚Äú Therefore‚Äù means ‚Äúfor that reason.‚Äù

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni 'khar gzhong la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni 'khar gzhong la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú This‚Äù refers to a basin, etc.

original: 'khar gzhong @171b la sogs pa'i rten 'ga' zhig gis ltung ba las gegs ma byas shing ma bzlog pa gang gi tshe /
analyzed: 'khar gzhong @171b la sogs pa'i rten 'ga' zhig gis ltung ba las gegs ma byas shing ma bzlog pa gang gi tshe /
translated: When there is no support, such as a basin, etc., to prevent or stop the fall,

original: gnas med de rtag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba kho na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnas med de rtag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba kho na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: then it will always fall. This is the meaning.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa ste /
translated: Therefore, etc. concludes.

original: yang gi sgras brten pa'i zhes bya ba'i sgra 'dis kyang dngos po skad cig ma can dag gi skad cig ma snga mas bsdus pa'i nye bar len pa'i yul 'dra ba las skad cig phyi mas bsdus pa 'byung ba dag la bya'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras brten pa'i zhes bya ba'i sgra 'dis kyang dngos po skad cig ma can dag gi skad cig ma snga mas bsdus pa'i nye bar len pa'i yul 'dra ba las skad cig phyi mas bsdus pa 'byung ba dag la bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù in the verse indicates that the word ‚Äúsupport‚Äù also refers to the similar objects of the prior moment of the momentary entities, which are included in the prior moment, and the entities that arise from the subsequent moment, which are included in the subsequent moment.

original: de'i phyir spyi la yang rnam pa 'di med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir khas blangs nas 'di skad du skyed par byed pa ma yin du zin kyang ltung ba'i gegs byed pa'i phyir 'jog par byed pa yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi la yang rnam pa 'di med do zhes bstan pa'i phyir khas blangs nas 'di skad du skyed par byed pa ma yin du zin kyang ltung ba'i gegs byed pa'i phyir 'jog par byed pa yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: Therefore, in order to demonstrate that this is also not the case for universals, he says, ‚ÄúGranted, but it is a support because it prevents the fall, even though it is not a producer.‚Äù

original: de nyid mi srid par bstan pa'i phyir skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid mi srid par bstan pa'i phyir skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that this is impossible, he says, ‚ÄúThe cause of the falling of the fruit of the emblic myrobalan,‚Äù and so on.

original: ltung ba'i ngang tshul can dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa de'i gegs byed pa ste /
analyzed: ltung ba'i ngang tshul can dang rgya shug gi 'bras bu la sogs pa de'i gegs byed pa ste /
translated: The cause of the falling of the fruit of the emblic myrobalan, etc., is the obstruction of falling.

original: ltung ba'i gegs byed pa skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyis kyang bla'o //
analyzed: ltung ba'i gegs byed pa skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyis kyang bla'o //
translated: It is also the cause of the obstruction of falling.

original: de byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ltung ba'i gegs byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ltung ba'i gegs byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it causes that, i.e., because it causes the obstruction of falling.

original: rdzas 'gro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas 'gro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The substance that possesses going possesses activity.

original: spyi yang lus can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: spyi yang lus can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But the universal does not possess a body.

original: bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid can la gnas pa ci zhig byed pas 'jog pa ste /
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid can la gnas pa ci zhig byed pas 'jog pa ste /
translated: What function does it perform in the absence of activity?

original: rten du 'gyur zhing gang gis spyi ltung ba med pa de'i gegs byed par gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: rten du 'gyur zhing gang gis spyi ltung ba med pa de'i gegs byed par gnas par 'gyur /
translated: It is a support, and by means of it the universal is not subject to falling.

original: 'on kyang gnas na ni de'i rang gi ngo bo 'pho ba med pa kho na zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang gnas na ni de'i rang gi ngo bo 'pho ba med pa kho na zhes bya'o //
translated: But if it does not fall, then it is said that its own nature is unchanging.

original: rang gi ngo bo 'pho ba med pa de yang rten la rag lus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo 'pho ba med pa de yang rten la rag lus pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, that which is not transferable by its own nature does not depend on a substratum,

original: spyi ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because a universal is permanent.

original: khas blangs nas kyang brjod pa ni rten la rag lus pa de yang spyi la gnas pa de'i tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: khas blangs nas kyang brjod pa ni rten la rag lus pa de yang spyi la gnas pa de'i tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa ste /
translated: Even if one accepts that, the statement that it depends on a substratum is a matter of debate, because it is a matter of debate whether it is different or non-different from that which is the substratum of a universal.

original: gzhan nyid dang gzhan nyid ma yin pa rnam par spyod par byed pa na spyi'i gnas pa mi rigs pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: gzhan nyid dang gzhan nyid ma yin pa rnam par spyod par byed pa na spyi'i gnas pa mi rigs pa kho na yin no //
translated: When one engages in the debate about whether it is different or non-different, it is simply not reasonable that it is the substratum of a universal.

original: rten gyi rgyu can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: rten gyi rgyu can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with ‚Äúthat which has a substratum as its cause,‚Äù etc.

original: rten gyi rgyu can zhes bya ba ni rten la rag las pa nyid do //
analyzed: rten gyi rgyu can zhes bya ba ni rten la rag las pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat which has a substratum as its cause‚Äù means that it depends on a substratum.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'o //üîΩde nyid ni spyi las gzhan du gnas pa de'i rten @172a * //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gnas pa'o // de nyid ni spyi las gzhan du gnas pa de'i rten @172a * //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to a universal.

original: byed pa yin gyi spyi byed ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa yin gyi spyi byed ba ni ma yin no //
translated: That very thing is the substratum of that which is different from a universal, but it is not the substratum of a universal.

original: gnas pa de ni spyi la rag lus pa de bas na 'brel ba las spyi la yang phan btags pa kho na yin snyam pa de bas na /
analyzed: gnas pa de ni spyi la rag lus pa de bas na 'brel ba las spyi la yang phan btags pa kho na yin snyam pa de bas na /
translated: Since that endurance is dependent on the universal, therefore, it is thought that the universal is benefited by the connection.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúIn that case, etc.‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni gnas pa don gzhan du 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gnas pa don gzhan du 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that case‚Äù means that endurance is transformed into something else.

original: de la spyi la rag lus pa'i rgyu cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la spyi la rag lus pa'i rgyu cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is not even a slight cause that is dependent on the universal.

original: spyi'i rten gyis spyi la ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhes bya bar khong nas dbyung ngo //
analyzed: spyi'i rten gyis spyi la ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhes bya bar khong nas dbyung ngo //
translated: What would the universal do for the support?

original: gal te gnas pa ni spyi la rag lus par khas blangs pa kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gnas pa ni spyi la rag lus par khas blangs pa kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: If endurance is accepted as being dependent on the universal,

original: rag las pa kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rag las pa kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúIf endurance is dependent on the universal, etc.‚Äù

original: rag lus pas yang khas blangs pa'o //
analyzed: rag lus pas yang khas blangs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDependent‚Äù means accepted.üîΩIf it is said that endurance is due to the support,

original: gal te gnas par byed pas so zhe na zhes bya ba ni rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa de'i gnas pa ni spyis byas pa de bas na /
analyzed: gal te gnas par byed pas so zhe na zhes bya ba ni rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa de'i gnas pa ni spyis byas pa de bas na /
translated: that endurance which is produced by the support is the endurance of that endurance. Since that endurance is produced by the universal,

original: rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa de ni spyi la rag las pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa de ni spyi la rag las pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The stability that is generated by the support is called ‚Äúdependent on the universal.‚Äù

original: de la yang ste gnas pa'i gnas byed pa las thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de la yang ste gnas pa'i gnas byed pa las thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: And that is also the case: the generation of stability is similar to the consequence.

original: rten la rag lus pa'i gnas pa'i de spyis byas pa gang yin pa de la rten gyi rgyu can gyi gnas pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba 'am tha dad par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: rten la rag lus pa'i gnas pa'i de spyis byas pa gang yin pa de la rten gyi rgyu can gyi gnas pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba 'am tha dad par 'gyur grang na /
translated: If the stability that is dependent on the support is produced by the universal, is it produced by the universal as the same as the stability that is generated by the support, or is it produced by the universal as different from the stability that is generated by the support?

original: bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin na ni rten kho nas de byas pa de yin pa'i phyir ci ltar na spyis byas pa yin /
analyzed: bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin na ni rten kho nas de byas pa de yin pa'i phyir ci ltar na spyis byas pa yin /
translated: If it is produced as the same, then since the support alone produces it, how could it be produced by the universal?

original: tha dad pa nyid yin na yang gnas pa de nyid ni spyis byas pa'i phyir rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa dang po la spyis ci zhig byas par 'gyur /
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid yin na yang gnas pa de nyid ni spyis byas pa'i phyir rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa dang po la spyis ci zhig byas par 'gyur /
translated: If it is produced as different, then since the stability is produced by the universal, what does the universal do to the original stability that is generated by the support?

original: 'on te spyis gnas pa gnyis pa byas pa gang yin pa de ni rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa la rag las pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'on te spyis gnas pa gnyis pa byas pa gang yin pa de ni rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa la rag las pa de'i tshe /
translated: But if the stability that is produced by the universal is dependent on the stability that is generated by the support,

original: rag las ba zhes bya ba de ji lta bu zhig brjod par bya /
analyzed: rag las ba zhes bya ba de ji lta bu zhig brjod par bya /
translated: What is this so-called dependence?

original: spyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa la rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pas gnas pa gzhan gsum pa byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: spyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa la rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pas gnas pa gzhan gsum pa byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The state of abiding generated by the universal is the third state of abiding generated by the basis.

original: de la yang thal bar 'gyur ba dang thug pa med par mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la yang thal bar 'gyur ba dang thug pa med par mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the error of infinite regress and the error of no end would be the same.

original: thug par 'gyur ba de bas na rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa la spyis byas pa'i phan par byed pa nges par mi gzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: thug par 'gyur ba de bas na rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa la spyis byas pa'i phan par byed pa nges par mi gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: Since the state of abiding generated by the basis does not definitely hold the benefit that is the action of the universal,

original: 'di'i ste spyi'i 'brel @172b pa dang ldan pa 'di ni rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i ste spyi'i 'brel @172b pa dang ldan pa 'di ni rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa yin no zhes bya bar shes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it is not understood that this state of abiding generated by the basis is related to this universal.

original: gal te skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te skyed par byed pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is said that it generates,

original: rag lus pa zhes bya ba'i skabs yin te /
analyzed: rag lus pa zhes bya ba'i skabs yin te /
translated: this is the context of dependence.

original: spyis rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa'i gnas pa gzhan byas pa'i ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: spyis rten gyis bskyed pa'i gnas pa'i gnas pa gzhan byas pa'i ni ma yin gyi /
translated: The state of abiding generated by the universal is not the state of abiding generated by the basis.

original: 'on kyang de nyid kyis dang po'i gnas pa bskyed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'on kyang de nyid kyis dang po'i gnas pa bskyed pa de'i tshe /
translated: But when it generates the initial abiding,

original: spyi yan gar ba'i nus pas gnas par byed par 'gyur bas gnas pa byed pa'i phyir khra mo la sogs pa'i rten la ltos pa ci zhig bya ste /
analyzed: spyi yan gar ba'i nus pas gnas par byed par 'gyur bas gnas pa byed pa'i phyir khra mo la sogs pa'i rten la ltos pa ci zhig bya ste /
translated: it would cause abiding by the power of the universal alone. Therefore, what is the use of relying on the basis, such as the cow?

original: phan mi 'dogs pa la ltos pa ni mi rung ngo //
analyzed: phan mi 'dogs pa la ltos pa ni mi rung ngo //
translated: It is not tenable that it relies on that which does not benefit it.

original: gang gi phyir ltos pa zhes bya ba ni de la rag lus pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ltos pa zhes bya ba ni de la rag lus pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúRelying‚Äù means depending on that.

original: dngos po 'di la 'di ltos pa zhes bya ba la ltos pa gang yin pa de ni ltos par bya ba 'di dang 'brel cing de la rag lus pa nyid do //üîΩrag lus pa de yang rtag pa nyid kyi phyir khyad par du byar med pa la mi rigs pas spyi yan gar bas gnas bskyed pa'i phyir gnas pa'i rgyu gzhan te /
analyzed: dngos po 'di la 'di ltos pa zhes bya ba la ltos pa gang yin pa de ni ltos par bya ba 'di dang 'brel cing de la rag lus pa nyid do // rag lus pa de yang rtag pa nyid kyi phyir khyad par du byar med pa la mi rigs pas spyi yan gar bas gnas bskyed pa'i phyir gnas pa'i rgyu gzhan te /
translated: That which is said to rely on this thing is connected to this thing on which it relies and it depends on that.

original: rten yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rten yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is illogical that that on which it depends, which is permanent, has no distinction, the universal alone does not generate abiding. Therefore the cause of abiding is not the existence of the basis.

original: de bas na gnas pa byed pa'i phyir spyi'i gzhi ni rten yin no zhe na bya ba de ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na gnas pa byed pa'i phyir spyi'i gzhi ni rten yin no zhe na bya ba de ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: This activity is not reasonable.

original: de ltar de yang tha dad tha dad med /
analyzed: de ltar de yang tha dad tha dad med /
translated: Thus, it is also neither different nor not different.

original: rnam par spyod pa zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de las re zhig tha dad pa'i phyogs gsal nas gnyis pa la phyogs brten pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par spyod pa zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de las re zhig tha dad pa'i phyogs gsal nas gnyis pa la phyogs brten pa ni /
translated: In the explanation of the analysis, first the position of difference is clarified, and in the second, the position of dependence is stated.

original: spyi las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: spyi las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The statement ‚Äúfrom the universal‚Äù and so on.

original: spyi la gnas pa tha dad pa med par khas blangs pa na yang /
analyzed: spyi la gnas pa tha dad pa med par khas blangs pa na yang /
translated: Even if one accepts that the universal is not different from abiding,

original: gnas pa'i ngo bo de ni spyi de'i rang gi ngo bo kho na yin te /
analyzed: gnas pa'i ngo bo de ni spyi de'i rang gi ngo bo kho na yin te /
translated: that essence of abiding is the very essence of that universal.

original: spyi'i rang gi ngo bo de yang rtag tu yod pa'i phyir spyi 'di ni rten 'ga' zhig gis kyang gnas par byed pa ma yin no //üîΩgang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: spyi'i rang gi ngo bo de yang rtag tu yod pa'i phyir spyi 'di ni rten 'ga' zhig gis kyang gnas par byed pa ma yin no // gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Since that essence of the universal always exists, this universal is not made to abide by any support at all.üîΩSince that is so, the statement ‚Äútherefore‚Äù and so on.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas mjug sdud pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas mjug sdud pa yin te /
translated: The conclusion is stated with ‚Äútherefore‚Äù and so on.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de bas na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de bas na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTherefore‚Äù means ‚Äúfor that reason.‚Äù

original: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni spyi'i'o //
analyzed: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni spyi'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to the general.

original: de bas na 'di skad du /
analyzed: de bas na 'di skad du /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: gnas pa rten dang gsal ba yin //
analyzed: gnas pa rten dang gsal ba yin //
translated: The universal is the basis and the manifestation.

original: zhes bya bas phyogs gnyis bshad pa de la dang po sun byung nas phyogs gnyis pa @173a * //
analyzed: zhes bya bas phyogs gnyis bshad pa de la dang po sun byung nas phyogs gnyis pa @173a * //
translated: Having refuted the first position, the second position is refuted.

original: brten pa ni /
analyzed: brten pa ni /
translated: The basis is stated

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩ'on kyang gsal ba ma yin pa //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / 'on kyang gsal ba ma yin pa //
translated: with ‚Äúbut not the manifestation.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni gsal bar gyur pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsal bar gyur pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBut not the manifestation‚Äù means not the manifestation.

original: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rten gyis so //
analyzed: gsal ba zhes bya ba ni rten gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúManifestation‚Äù is by the basis.

original: shes pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir de'i gsal ba la rten des gsal ba gang yin pa de nyid rten de la spyi gnas par 'gyur na'o //
analyzed: shes pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir de'i gsal ba la rten des gsal ba gang yin pa de nyid rten de la spyi gnas par 'gyur na'o //
translated: If the universal were to reside in that basis due to the manifestation of that basis, which is the manifestation of that which is the cause of consciousness,

original: slob dpon gyis de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: the master states ‚Äúthat is not so‚Äù and so forth.

original: bdag nyid rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa skye ba de la rung ba nus pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag nyid rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa skye ba de la rung ba nus pa de'i phyir /
translated: The arising of consciousness in relation to its own object is suitable due to its capacity.

original: gzhan gyi ngor byed pa rgyu gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de ni gsal bya yin par grags pa /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngor byed pa rgyu gzhan la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de ni gsal bya yin par grags pa /
translated: That which is a manifestor, a thing that depends on another cause, is known as the manifested.

original: rang gi yul las shes pa bskyed par rung ba de'i yang sgron ma la sogs pa byed pa po gang yin pa de ni gsal bya'i rgyu de nyid de skyed pa po kho na yin te /
analyzed: rang gi yul las shes pa bskyed par rung ba de'i yang sgron ma la sogs pa byed pa po gang yin pa de ni gsal bya'i rgyu de nyid de skyed pa po kho na yin te /
translated: That which is the agent, the lamp, etc., of that which is suitable to generate a consciousness of its object is the cause of the manifested, and it is only the generator.

original: bum pa la sogs pa sngar rung ba ma yin pa'i phyis rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa sngar rung ba ma yin pa'i phyis rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a pot, etc., is not suitable previously, but later generates consciousness.

original: gal te sgron ma la sogs pa nye ba las kyang bum pa la sogs pa dang po nyid nas kyang rang gi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa bskyed par rung ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te sgron ma la sogs pa nye ba las kyang bum pa la sogs pa dang po nyid nas kyang rang gi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa bskyed par rung ba de'i tshe /
translated: If a pot, etc., is suitable to generate a consciousness having its aspect even when a lamp, etc., is not present,

original: dang po nyid nas bum pa la sogs pas 'di rung ba nyid de la ltos pa zhes bya ba sgron ma la sogs pa la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: dang po nyid nas bum pa la sogs pas 'di rung ba nyid de la ltos pa zhes bya ba sgron ma la sogs pa la ltos pa'o //
translated: then a pot, etc., is suitable from the beginning, and it is said that it depends on that, i.e., the lamp, etc.

original: 'gyur ba med pa'i spyi ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa'i spyi ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: A permanent universal is not changeable.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i gsal bya'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i gsal bya'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the characteristic of the object to be manifested, as it has been explained.

original: spyi dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rten te gnas gang kho na las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyi dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rten te gnas gang kho na las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúEndowed with the universal‚Äù means the basis, i.e., that which is the support.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni rang gi rgyud la gzhan pa'i dngos po nyid skyed par byed pa la gsal bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni rang gi rgyud la gzhan pa'i dngos po nyid skyed par byed pa la gsal bar byed pa zhes bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAnother‚Äù means the production of a different entity in one‚Äôs own continuum. The producer is called the ‚Äúmanifester.‚Äù

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i nus pa rigs mthun pa nye bar len pa la ltos pa zhes bya ba la rang gi rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i skad cig ma snga ma la ltos pa dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i nus pa rigs mthun pa nye bar len pa la ltos pa zhes bya ba la rang gi rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i skad cig ma snga ma la ltos pa dang bcas pa ste /
translated: What is it like? It is the capacity to produce a consciousness of its object, which depends on a homogeneous appropriation. It is associated with the prior moment included in one‚Äôs own continuum.

original: dper na mun pa na gnas pa'i bum pa skad cig ma la ltos pa rnam par shes pa bskyed nus pa'i bum pa skad cig ma phyi ma skyed par byed pa'i gsal bar byed pa yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mun pa na gnas pa'i bum pa skad cig ma la ltos pa rnam par shes pa bskyed nus pa'i bum pa skad cig ma phyi ma skyed par byed pa'i gsal bar byed pa yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, a pot in the dark is the manifester of the subsequent moment of the pot, which is capable of producing a consciousness of it, just as the prior moment of the pot is.

original: ltos pa med pa @173b zhes bya ba ni dper na sgra rigs mthun pa'i nye bar len pa la ltos pa med par rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa ni gnas dang byed pa'i tshigs pa yin no //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa @173b zhes bya ba ni dper na sgra rigs mthun pa'i nye bar len pa la ltos pa med par rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa ni gnas dang byed pa'i tshigs pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout dependence‚Äù means that, for example, sound produces consciousness of its object without dependence on a homogeneous substantial cause.

original: snga na yod pa ni ma yin na gang gis na rigs mthun pa'i ltos pa'i sgra yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: snga na yod pa ni ma yin na gang gis na rigs mthun pa'i ltos pa'i sgra yod par 'gyur /
translated: If it does not exist prior to that, how could there be the word ‚Äúhomogeneous‚Äù in the expression ‚Äúhomogeneous substantial cause‚Äù?

original: pha rol po dag gi sgra ni gsal bar 'dod pa'i phyir de skad du bstan to //
analyzed: pha rol po dag gi sgra ni gsal bar 'dod pa'i phyir de skad du bstan to //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs theory is stated in this way because he believes that sound is manifest.

original: gal te byed pa po kho na gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te byed pa po kho na gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: If the agent is the manifestor,

original: 'o na ni byed pa po dang gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu dag la khyad par ci zhig yod snyam pa de bas na /
analyzed: 'o na ni byed pa po dang gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu dag la khyad par ci zhig yod snyam pa de bas na /
translated: then what is the difference between the agent and the cause of manifestation?

original: gzhan dag tu ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gzhan dag tu ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore he says, ‚ÄúIn other cases, etc.‚Äù

original: gsal bar byed pa las gzhan du byed pa po nyid du 'dod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa las gzhan du byed pa po nyid du 'dod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that in other cases, the agent is accepted as something other than the manifestor.

original: bskyed par bya ba la shes pa bskyed pa'i nus pa phangs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa bskyed par nus pa kho na'i 'bras bu sa bon la sogs pa'i byed pa pos skyed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba la shes pa bskyed pa'i nus pa phangs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa bskyed par nus pa kho na'i 'bras bu sa bon la sogs pa'i byed pa pos skyed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: The so-called ‚Äúunimpeded power of consciousness to generate‚Äù is the effect of the seed, etc., which is only the power to generate consciousness in regard to its own object.

original: skyed par byed pa tsam gyi rgyu nyid de /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa tsam gyi rgyu nyid de /
translated: It is the cause that is merely the generator,

original: rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa skye ba'i nus pa'i 'bras bu bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par gyis gsal bar byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa skye ba'i nus pa'i 'bras bu bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par gyis gsal bar byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: because it is the cause that is the power to generate consciousness in regard to its own object.

original: gal te yang gsal bar byed pa las gsal bar bya ba rnam par shes pa skyer rung ba nyid so sor thob pa de lta na yang skyed pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yang gsal bar byed pa las gsal bar bya ba rnam par shes pa skyer rung ba nyid so sor thob pa de lta na yang skyed pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Even though the object to be manifested is the individual obtainment of the consciousness that is suitable to be generated from the manifestor, it is not generated.üîΩIf you say that the manifestor manifests the object to be manifested, but does not generate it,

original: gal te gang las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /üîΩgang las zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa las so //
analyzed: gal te gang las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la / gang las zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa las so //
translated: then the response is ‚ÄúIf it is generated from that, etc.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúFrom that‚Äù means from the manifestor.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gsal bar ba ba'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gsal bar ba ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the object to be manifested.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the manifestor.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni rung ba nyid do //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni rung ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the suitability.

original: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to the manifested.

original: gsal bar byed pa nye ba'i phyir dang po nyid nas yod pa ste /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa nye ba'i phyir dang po nyid nas yod pa ste /
translated: The manifestor exists from the very beginning because of its proximity.

original: gang gi phyir de ni gsal bar bya ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ni gsal bar bya ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa yin no //
translated: Because it is the nature of the manifested.

original: ji ltar gsal bar bya ba'i dang po nyid nas yod pa de ltar de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa rung ba nyid kyang yod pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar gsal bar bya ba'i dang po nyid nas yod pa de ltar de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa rung ba nyid kyang yod pa yin no //
translated: Just as the manifested exists from the very beginning, so too the suitability that is its nature exists.

original: de la ltos pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa la'o //
analyzed: de la ltos pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt does not depend on that‚Äù means it does not depend on the manifestor.

original: gal te rung ba ni gsal bar bya ba las tha dad pa nyid du @174a * //
analyzed: gal te rung ba ni gsal bar bya ba las tha dad pa nyid du @174a * //
translated: If the manifestor makes the suitable different from the manifested,

original: gsal bar byed pas byas pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pas byas pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then the manifestor would make the manifested different from the suitable.

original: 'di gzhan du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /üîΩ'di ni zhes bya ba ni rung ba nyid na'o //
analyzed: 'di gzhan du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la / 'di ni zhes bya ba ni rung ba nyid na'o //
translated: In response to this, he says, ‚ÄúThis is not the case,‚Äù and so on.üîΩ‚ÄúThis‚Äù refers to the suitability.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni rung ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni rung ba nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the suitability.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa las so //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa las so //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the manifestation.

original: gnas pa bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ba ni gal te gzhan yin pa de nyid de'i rten byed pa yin la zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de 'dir yang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas pa bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ba ni gal te gzhan yin pa de nyid de'i rten byed pa yin la zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de 'dir yang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The consequence would be the same as in the case of endurance: if difference were the basis of manifestation, then that would be the basis of manifestation.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the manifestation.

original: gzhan yang byed pa ma yin pa ni gsal bar bya ba las gzhan te byed pa la gang gsal bar bya ba ni cung zhig kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang byed pa ma yin pa ni gsal bar bya ba las gzhan te byed pa la gang gsal bar bya ba ni cung zhig kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, that which is not a basis of manifestation is different from the manifestation, because there is no manifestation that is not a basis of manifestation.

original: ltos par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'dis ni phan 'dogs pa nyid bstan la /
analyzed: ltos par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'dis ni phan 'dogs pa nyid bstan la /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit would be dependent‚Äù shows that it would be helpful.

original: cung zhig kyang mi byed pas ni de 'dogs pa ma yin pa de bas na de ni 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: cung zhig kyang mi byed pas ni de 'dogs pa ma yin pa de bas na de ni 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Since it does not perform any function, it is not a basis of manifestation. Therefore, it is contradictory.

original: skyed par byed pa kho na gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de la /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa kho na gsal bar byed pa yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de la /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat which is the producer is the basis of manifestation‚Äù is explained as follows.

original: 'bras bu nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khrul pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khrul pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause it is the effect‚Äù shows that the reason is inconclusive.

original: du ba ni me'i skyed par byed pa nyid ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: du ba ni me'i skyed par byed pa nyid ma yin mod kyi /
translated: Smoke is not the producer of fire,

original: 'on kyang de'i 'bras bu nyid yin pa'i phyir gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i 'bras bu nyid yin pa'i phyir gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: but it is the indicator of fire because it is its effect.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni chu la chu skyar la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni chu la chu skyar la sogs pa'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúand so on‚Äù include the osprey and so on in relation to water.

original: gsal bar byed pa yin pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan yin te /üîΩdu ba'i rtags la ltos pas me ni rang ste /
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa yin pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan yin te / du ba'i rtags la ltos pas me ni rang ste /
translated: The response to the question ‚ÄúWhy is it the indicator?‚Äù is ‚ÄúBecause it is the effect of that.‚Äù

original: bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Fire, in dependence on the reason smoke, is not the producer of the cognition of its own characteristic.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na ;
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na ;
translated: Why is that?

original: de lta bur gyur pa rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i me ni mngon sum du skyed par byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i me ni mngon sum du skyed par byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the fire that is the object of inference, which is of that kind, is not the producer of the direct perception of itself.

original: gzhan du na me'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon sum kho nas de shes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan du na me'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon sum kho nas de shes par 'gyur te /
translated: Otherwise, because it would have the aspect of the own characteristic of fire, it would be known by direct perception alone.

original: brgyud pas 'brel pa ni yod pa yin te /
analyzed: brgyud pas 'brel pa ni yod pa yin te /
translated: There is a connection through a series.

original: de skad du me'i rang gi mtshan nyid ni du ba skyed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de skad du me'i rang gi mtshan nyid ni du ba skyed par byed pa yin la /
translated: The intrinsic identity of fire is that which generates smoke.üîΩFrom that, smoke and the cognition of smoke, one comes to know fire.

original: du ba dang du ba shes pa de las ni shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin pa de nyid kyi mngon sum du zhes bstan to //
analyzed: du ba dang du ba shes pa de las ni shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin pa de nyid kyi mngon sum du zhes bstan to //
translated: That is what is indicated by ‚Äúdirectly perceiving it.‚Äù

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar @174b len pa'i rgyu de nyid de mngon sum du skyed par byed pa yin no zhes ston par byed do //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar @174b len pa'i rgyu de nyid de mngon sum du skyed par byed pa yin no zhes ston par byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom that‚Äù and so on indicate that the cause of the apprehension is that which generates the direct perception.

original: nye bar len pa ni brtags shes pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa ni brtags shes pa'o //
translated: The apprehension is the cognition of the object.

original: yul gyi stobs kyis ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni me'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stobs kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gyi stobs kyis ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni me'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stobs kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúNot by the power of the object‚Äù means not by the power of the intrinsic identity of fire.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: med du zin kyang de la ste me shi nas yun ring zhig lon du zin kyang me shes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med du zin kyang de la ste me shi nas yun ring zhig lon du zin kyang me shes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even if it does not exist, that is, even if a long time has passed since the fire went out, the cognition of fire exists.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: brgyud pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: brgyud pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThrough a continuum‚Äù and so on.

original: rtags kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
analyzed: rtags kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
translated: Following the evidence is the conception of memory.

original: de'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas so //
translated: and it is in this way that the inference is produced.

original: 'di ltar 'ga' zhig du ba mthong bar 'gyur ba'i skyes bu 'ba' zhig la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'ga' zhig du ba mthong bar 'gyur ba'i skyes bu 'ba' zhig la /
translated: In this way, in the case of a person who sees smoke,

original: du ba dang me med du zin kyang der rnam pa 'ga' zhig gi du ba rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa skye la /
analyzed: du ba dang me med du zin kyang der rnam pa 'ga' zhig gi du ba rjes su dran pa'i rnam par rtog pa skye la /
translated: even though the fire is not present, the conceptual thought that remembers the smoke in some form arises.

original: phyis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa rjes su dran pa las 'di na du ba yod pa de bas na 'di na yang me yod do snyam pa de lta bu'i brgyud pas me'i shes pa skye ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: phyis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa rjes su dran pa las 'di na du ba yod pa de bas na 'di na yang me yod do snyam pa de lta bu'i brgyud pas me'i shes pa skye ba kho na yin no //
translated: Later, from the memory of the concomitance and the counter-pervasion, the cognition of fire arises in the form of ‚Äúwhere there is smoke, there is fire.‚Äù

original: spyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa 'di nyid la sbyor bar byed de /
analyzed: spyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa 'di nyid la sbyor bar byed de /
translated: This is the same as what was explained earlier with the words ‚Äúthe universal,‚Äù etc.

original: spyi'i rnam par snang ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa'i yul skye ba can ma yin pa ni yul zhig pa dang ma skyes pa la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i rnam par snang ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa'i yul skye ba can ma yin pa ni yul zhig pa dang ma skyes pa la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The object of an inferential cognition that appears in the form of a universal is not produced, because it exists even when the object has been destroyed or has not yet arisen.

original: gang gi tshe yul nye ba yin pa de'i tshe yang /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yul nye ba yin pa de'i tshe yang /
translated: Even when the object is present,

original: yul gyi stobs kyis skye ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni gong du rnam par rtogs rnam pa don dang 'brel par nges pa med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni don ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba med do zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: yul gyi stobs kyis skye ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni gong du rnam par rtogs rnam pa don dang 'brel par nges pa med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni don ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba med do zhes bya ba dang /
translated: It is not generated by the power of the object because the capacity of the object to generate a cognition is not in accordance with the object‚Äôs appearance. This is taught by the statement, ‚ÄúConceptualization does not arise in accordance with the object because there is no certainty that the appearance of the object is related to the meaning.‚Äù

original: yod pa dang med pa'i phyir rjes su byed pa'i nus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i phyir rjes su byed pa'i nus pa yin gyi /
translated: It is not generated by the power of the object because the capacity of the object to generate a cognition is not in accordance with the object‚Äôs existence or nonexistence.

original: snang ba'i phyir ni ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa dang / le'u gsum pa las rnam par mi rtog pa sgrub pa'i skabs su yang ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snang ba'i phyir ni ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa dang / le'u gsum pa las rnam par mi rtog pa sgrub pa'i skabs su yang ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is taught by the statement, ‚ÄúConceptualization does not arise in accordance with the object because there is no certainty that the appearance of the object is related to the meaning.‚ÄùüîΩIt is not generated by the power of the object because the capacity of the object to generate a cognition is not in accordance with the object‚Äôs appearance. This is taught by the statement, ‚ÄúConceptualization does not arise in accordance with the object because there is no certainty that the appearance of the object is related to the meaning.‚Äù

original: mngon sum du sbyor ba ste rang gi ngo bo la phan 'dogs pa rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i nus pas so //
analyzed: mngon sum du sbyor ba ste rang gi ngo bo la phan 'dogs pa rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i nus pas so //
translated: It is not generated by the power of the object because the capacity of the object to generate a cognition is not in accordance with the object‚Äôs existence or nonexistence.üîΩThis is taught by the statement, ‚ÄúConceptualization does not arise in accordance with the object because there is no certainty that the appearance of the object is related to the meaning.‚ÄùüîΩIt is not generated by the power of the object because the capacity of the object to generate a cognition is not in accordance with the object‚Äôs appearance. This is taught by the statement, ‚ÄúConceptualization does not arise in accordance with the object because there is no certainty that the appearance of the object is related to the meaning.‚ÄùüîΩIt is not generated by the power of the object because the capacity of the object to generate a cognition is not in accordance with the object‚Äôs existence or nonexistence.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa skye ba la'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa skye ba la'o //
translated: This is taught by the statement, ‚ÄúConceptualization does not arise in accordance with the object because there is no certainty that the appearance of the object is related to the meaning.‚Äù

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni sgron ma la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni sgron ma la sogs pa la'o //
translated: It is not generated by the power of the object because the capacity of the object

original: de las zhes bya ba ni sgron ma la sogs pa ltos par bya ba las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni sgron ma la sogs pa ltos par bya ba las so //
translated: From that means from the lamp and so on that are to be relied upon.

original: 'di skad du gsal bar @175a * //
analyzed: 'di skad du gsal bar @175a * //
translated: This is stated:

original: byed pa thams cad la skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa thams cad la skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba ni mi bya'o //
translated: All that is clear should not be called that which generates.
